rtse nas bskyed mos tshal du myur du mchi bar bgyi/ /chos dgongs brtson pa dka' thub spyod pas khyod kyang skyon mkhyen grang / /bdag kyang sems can dag pa bsrel nas yun ni ring lags la/ /sA la'i shing

ljon sdong po mchog kyang me tog kha 'bus te/ /bskyed mos tshal gyi dog sar da ni mchi ba'i rigs so lha/ /sos ka'i dus mchog bud med rnams kyi rgyan du gyur lags te/ /nags rgyu khu byug dang ni rma bya sgra

rab snyan pa 'byin/ /gtsang zhing mdzes la sna tshogs me tog rdul gyi ngad kyang ldang / /da ni mchi na ma thogs legs par bka' lung stsal du gsol/ /rgyal po'i dbang pos lha mo las ni de skad tshig thos
nas/ /dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khor la smras pa ni/ /bzhon pa bzhon che mgyogs pa'i shugs ldan dag kyang bstad par gyis/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan lum bi ni tshal brgyan

par gyis/ /ri sngo'i mdog ldan sprin gyi kha dog 'thun par gyur pa yi/ /glang po stong phrag nyi shu snyed cig myur du bstad par gyis/ /glang po'i dbang po mche ba drug ldan dril mdzes glo la rgyus/ /gser dang

nor bus rnam par spras shing gser gyi dra bas spud/ /rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/ /dngul dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rnga rngog lcang lo bzang 'khril ba'i/ /rta mchog

stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du stong gyis te/ /gser dril g.yer ka'i dra ba glo nas spyang ba gyis/ /skyes bu rtul phod g.yul la mos shing 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag /mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha rno

thogs pa/ /stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du chos te bsham gyis la/ /sgyu 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni bsrung bar gyis/ /lum bi ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khrom brgyan par gyis/ /gos
dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad brgyan par gyis/ /lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs chal par khrom/ /de ltar thams cad bshams zin myur du nga la sbran par gyis/ /'khor rnams

kyis ni de skad tshig thos skad cig tu/ /bzhon pa kun bshams de bzhin lum bi ni yang brgyan byas te/ /rgyal gyur rgyal gyur sku tshe ring skyongs rgyal po gshegs su gsol/ /ji skad bka' stsal de bzhin kun
bgyis dus bab lha gzigs shig /mi yi bdag po dam pa de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur nam/ /khyim gyi dam par zhugs te bud med rnams la 'di skad smras/ /gang zhig nga la snying nye nga la dga' bar 'dod
pa dag /nga yi bka' bzhin gyis te bdag gi lus kun brgyan par gyis/ /spos mchog ngad kyi dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs sdug pa'i gos/ /'jam zhing yid 'ong dga' ba'i sems kyis legs par bgo

bar gyis/ /brang na 'phyang ba'i mu tig se mo do yis brgyan par gyis/ /rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad de ring kun gyis bstan par gyis/ /khar rnga rgyud gcig gling bu'i pi wang rdza rnga dum dum pag /sil

snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag kyang bsham par gyis/ /sgra snyan thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing / /lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur ba khyed kyis gyis/ /shing rta'i

mchog 'dir lha mo sgyu 'phrul gcig pu 'dug par gyis/ /bud med skyes pa gzhan dag su yang shing rta der ma 'khod/ /na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing rta de drongs te/ /gang du'ang yid du mi 'ong mi

mthun sgra rnams mi grag kyis/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nas byung ste sgo drung phyin pa'i tshe/ /rta dang glang po shing rta rkang tang dpal ldan sna tshogs dpung / /rgyal po'i sgo drung lhags tshe sgra chen mang po grag par gyur/ /

rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra ltar de dag yongs su grag /de tshe bkra shis don du dril bu brgya stong dkrol bar byas/ /shing rta de yang de ltar rgyal pos sna tshogs brgyan pa la/ /lha rnams stong gis lha yi khri

yang legs par bsham pa byas/ /rin chen shing ljon me tog lo ma ldan bzhin ldan par byas/ /rma bya khrung khrung ngang pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan che phra kun nas bsgreng / /

lha yi gos dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis bkab/ /lha yi bu mo nam mkha' las ni shing rta de la lta/ /lha yi sgra dbyangs snyan pa sgrog cing bstod pa'i tshig brjod de/ /gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul seng
ge'i khri la 'dug gyur pa/ /de tshe stong gsum sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /lha rnams gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin cing me tog sna tshogs 'thor/ /de ring lum bi ni 'dir 'gro ba'i dam pa bltam
gyur te/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ni shing rta'i mchog de 'dren par byed/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag po dbang po'ang lam gyi byi dor byed/ /tshangs pa skye bo mi srun sel cing sngon du 'gro bar gyur/ /

lha rnams brgya phrag stong yang thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bkod pa de la lta/ /de ni 'di snyam 'di ni lha yi lha zhig yin snyam byed/ /gang la skyong ba bzhi dang

tshangs pa dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /mchod pa rgya chen byed pa 'di ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum na lha klu brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong / /gang yang mchod pa 'di 'dra bzod pa'i
sems can de med de/ /yang na mgo 'gas yang na de dag srog dang bral bar 'gyur/ /'di ni lha yi dam pa yin pas mchod pa thams cad bzod/ /dge slong dag de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rta'i shing rta rgyan

thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni kun nas bskor/ glang po che'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa dang
ldan pa/ go cha legs par bgos pa sra ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni yongs su bsrungs/ shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du bdar/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i phu nu'i rigs su

skyes pa'i shAkya rgan pa dang / bzhon pa dang / bar ma bzhi khris ni yongs su bsrungs/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i slas glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byed/ khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg rdob sil snyan

dang / glu dbyangs len pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/ lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri

bzhi stong dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa sha stag glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis bsngags pa brjod pa/ rjes su 'brang bas 'gro'o/ /
lum bi ni'i nags tshal de thams cad kyang spos chu'i chag chag gis btab cing lha'i me tog gis gtor bar gyur to/ /nags tshal dam pa de'i nang na shing ljon pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams

cad kyang dus la ma bab par lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu skyed par gyur to/ /nags tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dres pa'i tshal lha rnams kyis legs par

brgyan pa bzhin no/ /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum bi ni'i nags tshal du phyin nas shing rta dam pa de las babs te/ mi dang lha'i bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor cing / shing drung nas ni shing drung dag tu 'gro/ nags

tshal nas ni nags tshal dag tu 'chag /ljon pa nas ni ljon pa dag la lta zhing de rim gyis shing rin po che chen po mchog dang phul du bya ba/ yal ga shin du rnam par 'byes pa/ lo ma dang dog pa bzang po dang

ldan pa/ mi dang lha'i me tog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog dang phul du bya ba'i dri'i ngad dang ldan pa'i gos kha dog sna tshogs spyangs pa/ nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i 'od rnam pa tha dad pa
'bar ba/ rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma rnams rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa/ yal ga ring zhing shin du rnam par 'byes pa/ blag sha zhes bya ba sa'i phyogs lag

mthil ltar mnyam zhing shin du bzang la yangs pa/ rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu skyes pa/ ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'i sa la 'dug pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba'i yum gyis brten pa/ lha'i

glu dbyangs blangs pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha bzang zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis thor tshugs dang cod pan mngon par btud pa'i spyi bos mngon par phyag bya

ba'i shing ljon pa blag sha de'i drung du phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus shing blag sha des mngon par btud de phyag byas so/ /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul nam mkha'i dkyil du snang ba'i glog gi

phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas/ blag sha'i yal ga las bzung ste/ tshul du shis par nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas nas bya smyangs byed cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i

lha'i nang nas lha'i bu mo drug khri lhags te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la rim gro dang bkur sti byed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan

par gnas so/ /de zla ba bcu tshang nas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas dran zhing shes bzhin du mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung ste/ gzhan ltar ma yin zhing gzhan dag la mngal gyi dri ma zhes bya ba brjod pa lta bu

med par gyur to/ /dge slong dag de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis mdun na 'khod de/ de gnyis kyis rim gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gos ka shi pa'i sleb mos lus
dang yan lag thams cad kyis dran zhing shes bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blangs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa gang gi nang na 'dug cing ma'i rum na gnas gnas pa de yang mi mjed kyi

bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gyen du bteg ste/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni mir gyur pa
gang gis kyang ma blangs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sa la 'bab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de sa la/ babs par gyur ma

thag tu pad ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di yang brtol te byung ngo / /klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na lus phyed phyung ste 'khod nas bsil ba dang / dro ba'i

chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus bkrus so/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa gzhan yang lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas

ma thag tu spos chu sna tshogs dang / me tog sil mas lus 'khru zhing mngon par 'thor ro/ /bar snang las kyang rdul yab kyi rnga ma gnyis dang / rin po che'i gdugs byung bar gyur to/ /de pad ma chen po de la

'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta ste/ seng ge'i lta stangs dang / skyes bu chen po'i lta bstangs kyis rnam par lta'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba
lha'i mig thogs pa med pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad grong khyer dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang ljongs su bcas/ yul du bcas/ mi dang lhar bcas pa rnams mthong
bar gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang sems can gang tshul khrims sam/ ting nge 'dzin tam/ shes rab bam/ dge ba'i spyod pas bdag dang

'dra ba de lta bu gang la la zhig yod dam zhes rnam par lta'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdag dang mtshungs pa'i sems can gang yang ma mthong nas/
de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing bag tsha ba med de/ zhum pa dang bag 'chums pa med pas legs par bsam pa dran par byas te/ bsams brtags nas sems can thams

cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par bya ste/ sus kyang brtan pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes shar phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /de ltar

byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba de dang de dag tu pad ma dag kyang skyes par gyur to/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes lho phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /

nub phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas te nga ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa'o/ /'di ni nga'i skye ba tha ma ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes
seng ge ltar tshim par gyur pa'i sgra sgrags so/ /sems can thams cad kyi nang na bla na med par bya'o zhes byang phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /bdud dang bdud kyi sde ni gzhom par bya'o/ /sems
can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me gsad pa'i phyir chos kyi char sprin chen po'i char phab ste/ de dag bde bas tshim par bya'o zhes 'og gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /

sems can thams cad kyi gyen du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes steng gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas steng du lta'o/ /byang chub sems dpas tshig de brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sgras mngon par go bar gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid do/ /gang gi tshe byang chub

sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi
rnam pa de lta bu de dag byung ngo / /dge slong dag de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu g.yos par gyur to/ /'jig rten du sa g.yo ba chen po shin du 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur

ba yang byung bar gyur to/ /mi dang lha'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgrar bya ba thams cad kyang ma blangs par sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams

cad du dus dang dus mtshams so so'i shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags pa dang rnam par dag par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil nas kyang sprin gyi sgra grags te/ sprin med pa'i nam mkha'

las kyang dal bus dal bus phra ba'i char lha yul ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / spos kyi phye ma dang 'dres pa 'bab par gyur to/ /rlung reg na mchog tu bde ba 'jam pa dri zhim po

dag kyang ldang bar gyur to/ /phyogs thams cad kyang mun pa dang / rdul dang / du ba dang / khug rna med cing rab tu dang bas rnam par mdzes par gyur to/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang tshangs pa'i sgra chen po mi snang

zhing zab pa grag par gyur to/ /nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/ 'od kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa/ reg na mchog tu bde ba/ sems
can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde ba skyed pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' btsas
ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyang bde bas shin du tshim par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dregs pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / zhum pa dang / 'jigs pa dang /
chags pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna thams cad dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bya ba thams cad spangs par gyur to/ /sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to/ /bkres shing skom pa'i
sems can rnams kyang bkres pa dang skom pa med par gyur to/ /chang gis ra ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang myos pa med par gyur to/ /smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /mig med pa rnams
kyis kyang mig thob par gyur to/ /rna ba 'on pa rnams kyis kyang sgra thos par gyur to/ /yan lag dang nying lag nyams pa rnams kyang dbang po nyams pa med par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyis kyang
nor thob par gyur to/ /btson ra na 'khod pa rnams kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to/ /mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nad du bya ba dang sdug bsngal
thams cad de'i tshe rgyun chad par gyur to/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyis gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams

kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par spyad pa shin du spyad pa/ brtson 'grus
chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe chos nyid thob pas de'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams kyis sa'i phyogs de de'i tshe zhig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa mdzad de/ dge slong dag de tsam du stobs kyi shugs drag po dang ldan par byang chub sems
dpa' btsas ma thag pa gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe glu'i sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur te/

gar gyi sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe me tog dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / gos kyi sprin dpag tu med pa dag kyang char du mngon par bab par gyur
to/ /sems can thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ mdor na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe/ bya ba bsam
gyis mi khyab pa byung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad las ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste/ byang

chub sems dpa' nyid kyang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur na/ da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan

'das 'di ltar bdag ni lan bzhi 'am/ lan lngar yang / lan bcur yang / lan lnga bcu'i bar du yang / lan brgya'i bar du yang / lan brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o/ /
de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong la la lus ma bsgoms pa/
sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa mi mkhas pa/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/ rgod pa/ khengs pa/ ma bsdams pa/ sems g.yengs pa/ nem nur gyis 'khor

ba/ the tshom mang ba/ dad pa med pa/ dge sbyong gi dri mar gyur pa/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mi 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa 'di lta bu thos nas yid mi ches shing
de dag phyogs gcig tu tshogs nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye khyed cag 'di lta bu'i mi rigs pa la ltos/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa btsog pa'i khu shugs dang 'dres pa la yang

'di lta bu'i longs spyod yod ces bya ba dang / de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par 'byung zhes bya ba 'di rigs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes zer bar 'gyur te/ skyes bu glen pa de

dag ni sems can legs par byas pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus mi gtsang ba'i khu ba'i nang du mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi shes so/ /dge slong dag sems can dam pa de lta bu dag gi mngal du 'gro ba dang
mngal na gnas pa ni shin du yang bzang ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la snying brtse bas mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ lhar gyur pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ro/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo sems can rnams zhum par 'gyur zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni lhar gyur pa yin gyi/
bdag cag ni mi tsam du zad pas na/ bdag cag gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar mi nus so/ /zhes zhum par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/ skyes bu glen pa chos kyi rkun por gyur
pa de dag 'di snyam du sems can de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de ni bdag cag gis tshod gzung bar bya ba ma yin no/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /kun dga' bo de dag ni de'i tshe sangs
rgyas kyi cho 'phrul la'ang yid mi ches par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ kun dga' bo da ltar skyes
bu glen pa rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i zil gyis non pa/ mi gtsang bar bying ba/ rim gro'i zil gyis non pa/ ma rabs kyi ngang tshul can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos spong
zhing bsod nams ma yin pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba mang po ji snyed cig mngon par 'du byed pa la ltos/ /'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
bam po lnga pa/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde bzang po la yang spong zhing mi snyan par brjod pa de lta bu'i dge slong dag kyang 'byung ba lags

pa lta/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de dag ni mdo sde 'di lta bu spong zhing mi snyan pa brjod par yang ma zad de/ sdig pa rnam pa du ma mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed cing dge

sbyong gi dngos po don du mi gnyer ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de 'dra ba de dag gi 'gro ba ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ tshe rabs phos nas
ni ji lta bu zhig tu mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med par byas te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi snyan pas skur ba btab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spu g.yos nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi spyod pa 'di dag thos nas bdag ni brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de dag gi spyod pa ni mnyam par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag ni mi mnyam pa'i spyod pa can du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de dag tshul dang mi 'dra
ba'i spyod pa des mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang
la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing yid mi ches pa dang / spong ba de dag ni shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/ kun dga' bo
de bzhin gshegs pa la ni tshad du ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med cing zab la rgya che zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /kun dga' bo la la zhig
gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skye ba'i sems can de dag gis ni thob pa legs par thob pa yin te/ de dag gi 'tsho ba ni don yod pa'o/ /
de dag gi mi'i dngos po ni don yod pa'o/ /de dag gi spyod pa legs par spyad pa'o/ /de dag gis ni snying po blangs so/ /de dag ni ngan song gsum las grol ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sras su 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su thob bo/ /de dag gis dad pa thob pa ni don yod do/ /de dag gis ni yul 'khor gyi zas legs
par zos so/ /de dag gis ni sems can dam pa rnams la legs par mos pa yin no/ /de dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa gtubs pa yin no/ /de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rgal to/ /de dag
gis ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu phyung ngo / /de dag gis ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po rjes su thob bo/ /de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba legs par blangs so/ /de dag ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin te mchod par
'os pa'o/ /de dag ni 'jig rten na 'byung bar dkon pa'o/ /de dag ni 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gzung ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang
mi mthun pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la dad pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin te/ kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig
tu 'grogs par gyur pa'i grogs po ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo la la ni thos pa tsam gyis dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi mthong na ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo la la ni mthong

bas dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi thos pas ni ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo la la ni mthong na yang dga' zhing yid du 'ong la thos na yang dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod do/ /kun dga' bo gang yang rung ste/
la la zhig mthong ngam/ thos nas dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de la 'di ltar de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs pa'i grogs po yin par nges par rtogs par bya ste/
de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgrol bar bya ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang yon tan gyi cha mnyam pa'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
skyabs su dong ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bzung ba'o/ /kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid kyi tshe yang sems can su yang rung ste/ 'jigs pas nyam thag cing
'ongs nas mi 'jigs pa slong na sems can de dag la ngas mi 'jigs pa byin par gyur na/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/
kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bcol ba'o/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis bya ba ci yod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byas so/ /nga rgyal gyi zug rngu ni de
bzhin gshegs pas bsal to/ /kun dga' bo grogs po'i gtam thos pa tsam gyis kyang dpag tshad brgya'i lam du yang 'gro ste/ thos pas kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba yin na/ sngar ma mthong ba las

mdza' bo mthong bar gyur na smos kyang ci dgos te/ gang nga la rten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa de dag ni ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyis mkhyen cing sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' bo ste/ de dag ni bdag cag gi yang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo mdza' bo

gang yin pa de ni mdza' bo la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /mdza' bo de'i gang sdug pa'i grogs po de yang de la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud
par byas/ dad pa tsam yang skyed par gyis shig /ngas ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang gtad de/ /de dag kyang 'di
dag ni bdag cag gi yang mdza' bo yin no zhes bya bar mkhyen cing / /bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig la bu dag nyan cing / 'thun par 'dzin
pa gcig pu zhig bdog par gyur la/ skyes bu de yang mdza' bo mang ba zhig yin na/ pha de shir zin kyang pha'i mdza' bos yongs su bzung ba'i bu de ni phongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin du

gang su yang rung ste nga la dad na de dag ngas bzung ba yin te/ /de dag ni nga'i mdza' bo'o/ /de dag ni nga la skyabs su dong ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdza' bo mang po mnga' ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung zhing brdzun du mi gsung bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung ba ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes su gtad kyis/ kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig /'di ni ngas khyod la bcol ba'o/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/ lha'i

bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor
bar gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dri med rnam dag gser gyi 'od ldan nyi zla'i 'od ldan pa/ /lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan brjod stong phrag drug bcu de yi tshe/ /skad cig de la lum
bi nir lhags lha mo sgyu 'phrul de la smra/ /mi dgyes ma mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed lags/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bgyi ba ci mchi ci bgyi ci 'tshal bka' stsol cig /bdag
cag khyod kyi phyag rjed nus ldan nye ba'i sems dang ldan pa lags/ /khyod kyis dgyes shing bde ba'i nyams skyes mi dgyes thams cad spang bar gsol/ /rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa de ring lha mo
myur skyed 'gyur/ /ji ltar zhugs shing 'di rnams kha 'bus sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing / /stong phrag bgrangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnas shing lag pa 'dud pa dang / /ji ltar dog sa rgya mtshor bcas
te rnam pa drug tu g.yos lags na/ /khyod las lha yul mi yul sgra grags 'jig rten 'das pa'i sras bltam 'gyur/ /ji ltar rnam dag 'od kyis rnam par mdzes shing gser gyi kha dog bzang / /nam
mkha'i dkyil las yid 'ong sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra 'byin dang / /ji ltar dag cing gtsang la 'dod chags bral ba'i lha rnams brgya stong yang / /dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de ring 'jig rten
kun phan bltam par gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan dag kyang / /dga' zhing brod pa'i sems kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid/ /skyes bu seng ge

brtul zhugs grub pa de yang rtsib logs g.yas nas byung / /gser gyi ri dang 'dra zhing dag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltam/ /brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dar te thub pa de yang blangs/ /
zhing rnams brgya stong 'od bzangs bkye bas thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /ngan song gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med gyur te/ /lha rnams brgya phrag stong gis me tog
gtor te gos kyi g.yab mo phyung / /de tshe sa 'di stobs mthu ldan zhing rdo rje'i dngos gnas pad ma mdzes/ /sna tshogs mngon mthon dge la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ris zhabs
bzhag ste/ /gom pa bdun du bzhud nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa ni/ /rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa sems can mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i mchog dang brgya byin lha
mchog nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod gyur te/ /gtsang zhing dang la mdzes pa'i spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku yang bsil/ /klu yi rgyal gnyis bar snang gnas nas grang dro'i chu yi rgyun kyang gtor/ /
lha rnams brgya stong dag kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsil byed/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang rim gro dam par lag pa bzang pos len/ /stong gsum 'di 'ang rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par
rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /mdzes pa'i 'od rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bltam pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal de dag zhi/ /mi yi 'dren
pa rgyal ba la/ lha rnams me tog sil ma 'thor/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi/ /brtan pa gom pa bdun du bzhud/ /sa phyogs gang du zhabs bzhag pa/ /der ni pad ma bzang ba'i
mchog /rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa dag /sa las mngon du 'thon par gyur/ /de ltar gom pa bdun bzhud nas/ /rga dang 'chi ba sel ba yi/ /sman pa dam pa 'dir byung zhes/ /tshangs
pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung brjod do/ /'jigs med phyogs su rnam gzigs te/ /de nas don ldan gsung phyung ba/ /nga ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/ /'jig rten phul phyin rnam par 'dren/ /nga yi
skye mtha' 'di yin zhes/ /mi yi 'dren pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ /lha dbang bcas dang 'jig rten skyong dag rab tu dad sems skyes/ /spos chu mchog gis 'jig rten phan pa'i don mdzad sku yang bsil/ /klu yi

dbang po rnams kyang lhan cig 'thun par byas nas ni/ /dri zhim spos chu dag gis rgyun gyis sku yang bsil ba byas/ /lha gzhan khrag khrig dag kyang bar snang la ni gnas nas su/ /dri zhim spos chu mchog gi
rgyun gyis rang byung sku yang bsil/ /gdugs dkar yangs dang rnga yab bzang po dam pa thogs nas ni/ /bar snang 'khod de lha rnams mi yi khyu mchog sku bsil byed/ /skyes bu gcig cig rings par 'ongs nas

zas gtsang de la dgar smras pa/ /lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur khyod kyi sras ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa bltam/ /de ni nges par 'khor los sgyur ba dbang phyug gdung rabs rin chen 'tshob/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'di
gdugs mang cig 'gyur phas kyi dgra yang ma mchis 'gyur/ /de nas skyes bu gnyis 'ongs zas gtsang rgyal po'i mdun du de song ste/ /lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur shAkya'i rigs su rgyal bu skyes gyur na/ /

shAkya rnams kyi grong du rogs pa 'bum phrag lnga ni btsas pa skyes par gyur/ /kun kyang gzhan gyis mi thub stobs dang ldan zhing tshan po che dang 'dra/ /skyes bu gzhan 'ongs smras pa bdag las dgyes pa'i sgra gson lha/ /

'dun pa can la sogs pa 'bangs kyi byis pa brgyad brgya btsas par gyur/ /bsngags ldan gyi ni zla bo chibs rta stong phrag bcu dag 'brangs gyur te/ /chibs mchog dam pa gser gyi 'od ldan rnga rngog lcang lor
'khril ba lags/ /mtha' 'khob khams kyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du/ /rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis kyis legs par rgyal gyur lha/ /da ni bdag mchis sug las ci bgyi
rgyal pos bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ rgyal po khyod 'dir mnga' brnyes bdag 'bangs jo bo lha cig rgyal bar spyon/ /gser gyi dra bas mdzes pa'i glang po dam pa stong phrag nyi shu dag /nam

mkha' las ni sgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po'i khab tu mgyogs su mchis/ /sbrum ma la sogs nag gu zal lu dag dang be'u ni drug stong 'brangs/ /lha cig lha mchog bltam zhing de dag btsas pas rgyal khab phun
sum tshogs/ /rje cig rgyal por gshegs te bsod nams gzi 'od ldan pa bltam pa yi/ /yon tan dag ni mthong bar gyur nas lha dang mi rnams stong bgrangs pa/ /rab tu dga' bar gyur dang kun la
nyid kyis legs par gzigs su gsol/ /myur du rgyal gyur cig ces byang chub dam pa mya ngan med par zhugs/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang skad cig de la sbyin pa'i

gtong ba yang de bas rgya cher gyur to/ /ya rabs kyi rigs lnga brgya yang btsas par gyur to/ /grags ldan la sogs pa bu mo khri dang / bran mo brgyad brgya dang / 'dun pa la sogs pa bran lnga brgya dang / rte'u

mo khri dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa rte'u pho khri dang / ba lang gi phrug gu mo lnga brgya dang / ba lang gi phrug gu pho lnga brgya po dag kyang btsas shing 'brangs par gyur nas de dag thams cad rgyal po zas

gtsang mas sna grangs yi ger bris te sras bu gzhon nu rtsen pa'i phyir byin par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i

dbus kyi sa phyogs nas a shwad tha'i sdong po skyes par gyur to/ /gling phra mo rnams su yang tsan dan gyi nags tshal skyes par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du grong khyer gyi kho ra

yug tu yang bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya dag byung bar gyur to/ /gter lnga stong yang sa'i 'og nas gyen du 'bus te sgo ston par gyur to/ /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de dag thams

cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du bdag gi bu gzhon nu de'i ming ji skad cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bu 'di skyes ma thag tu bdag gi don
thams cad yang dag par grub par gyur gyis/ 'di'i ming ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro cher byas nas bu 'di'i ming don
thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes ming du btags so/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas ma'i glo g.yas pa yang ma ral ma nyams shing sngon bzhin du gyur to/ /der khron pa lan gsum

ldud pa dag kyang byung bar gyur/ spos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzing bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar dri zhim po khyer te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du
lhags nas/ bltam pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam/ zhes 'dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byug pa dang / rnam par byug pa thogs te/ byang chub sems

dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam/ zhes 'dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa thogs te/ byang chub

sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i gos thogs te byang chub sems dpa'i

ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du

lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang glu dbyangs len cing byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags te bltam pa legs

par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to/ /'dzam bu yi gling 'di na phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te/
rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du 'khod nas/ rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog par gyur to/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lum bi ni'i nags tshal

du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas rim gror byas so/ /bkur bstir byas so/ /sting stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas so/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dag kyang drangs par gyur to/ /shAkya'i

tshogs thams cad kyang 'dus nas kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to/ /sbyin pa dag kyang byin no/ /bsod nams dag kyang byed do/ /bram ze sum khri nyis stong yang nyin gcig bzhin du tshim par byas so/ /su dag ci

'dod pa de dag la yang de byin par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa yang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khye'u yi gzugs su sprul te gral gyi thog ma la 'khod nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod par

gyur to/ /ji ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing / /ji ltar 'gro kun bde las na/ /'gro la bde ba 'god pa yi/ /bde ba mdzad cig bltam par mngon/ /ji ltar rab rib med 'od kyis/ /lha dang nyi zla'i 'od rnams kyang / /

mi snang zil du rlag pa las/ /bsod nams 'od cig byung bar mngon/ /mig med rnams kyang mthong gyur cing / /rna ba 'on pas sgra thos la/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran ldan las/ /'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon/ /

ji ltar nyon mongs mi gnod cing / /'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur las/ /tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su/ /gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar mngon/ /sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing / /sa yang mnyam par gnas pa las/ /

'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa yi/ /thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar mngon/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'khrug med cing / /pad ma chen po 'thon pa las/ /nges par gzi brjid chen po 'di/ /'jig rten mgon du byon par 'gyur/ /

lha yi spos kyis spags gyur pa/ /'jam pa'i rlung gi ngad ldang zhing / /sems can nad rnams zhi gyur las/ /'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byon/ /gzugs khams gnas pa'i lha brgya po/ /'dod chags bral ba 'di dag

kyang / /thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud pa las/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas su byon/ /mi rnams kyis ni lha mthong zhing / /lha rnams kyis ni mi mthong yang / /phan tshun 'tshe ba med pa las/ /'di ni ded dpon chen por byon/ /
me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing / /chu klung thams cad mi g.yo la/ /sa yang dal bus g.yo ba las/ /'di ni yang dag gzigs par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag
bdun lon pa dang / lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi ba'i dus byas par gyur te/ de shi ba'i dus byas nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes so/ /dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i

lan bon gyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni mthar thug pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang btsas
nas zhag bdun lon na ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes te dbang po yongs su rdzogs nas mngon par byung na ma snying 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro/ /

dge slong dag de ltar zhag bdun lon nas thog ma ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul bkod pa ji lta bus bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs par gyur pa de dag las bye ba brgya stong gyur pas kyang lhag pa'i

bkod pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su zhugs so/ /de zhugs pa dang / bum pa spos chus gang ba lnga stong gis mdun du drangs par gyur to/ /de bzhin du bu mo lnga stong ni rma bya'i

mdongs lag na thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni shing ta la'i yal ga thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni spos chu'i ril ba bring ga ra thogs te lam chag chag gis 'debs shing

mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni nags tshal gyi me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba khye'u tshang sna tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni bzang por sgyur ba'i rin po che thogs te/ lam gyi byi

dor byed cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni stan bzang po thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bram ze lnga stong ni dril bu thogs te bkra shis kyi sgra 'byin cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /glang

po lnga stong ni rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /rta nyis khri ni gser gyi brgyan gyis bkab cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /shing rta brgyad khri ni gdugs dang /

rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa/ yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ go

cha sra ba bgos pa bzhi khri ni byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha grags pa grags pa che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag

ni nam mkha'i dkyil nas bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du ma byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /shing rta gang la byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha

rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du mas legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis chas pa rin po che'i phreng ba thogs pa nyis khri shing rta de drangs te lha'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni mi'i bu mo gcig

'dug /mi'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni lha'i bu mo gcig 'dug kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu mos kyang mi'i bu mo'i dri mi zhim pa mi tshor/ mi'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs mthong na bag

med par ma gyur to/ /dge slong dag ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ched du khyim lnga brgya phub ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer der 'jug pa'i tshe/
rang rang gis byas pa'i khyim gyi sgor 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas lus gus par btud de rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du/ kye don thams cad grub pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye lha'i lha 'dir
gshegs su gsol/ kye sems can dag pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kha lo sgyur ba dam pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye dga' zhing bde ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs
su gsol/ kye smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kun nas spyan mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa'i yon tan dang gzi brjid
mnga' ba/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes de skad 'dzer to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de dag thams cad dang 'thun par

bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim de kun du yang zhugs par byas te/ zla ba bzhi lon pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi khyim du zhugs te rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen po der
byang chub sems dpa' zhugs par gyur to/ /de na shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te bgros pa/ phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems kyis yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jam pa dang ldan par byang

chub sems dpa' btsa' ba dang / byi dor bya ba dang / nyams su blang bar sus nus shes byas pa dang / de na shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o/ /bdag gis

gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o zhes zer ro/ /de na shAkya ches 'gras ches 'gras pa de dag na re bu mo 'di dag thams cad ni byis pa gzhon nu thor bu gzhon nu la gzugs dang dar la bab pas rgyags shing dregs pa
yin pas 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dus su rim gro bya ba mi nus so/ /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI gzhon nu'i sru mo ste/ 'dis ni gzhon nu bde ba dang legs par skyed par nus
so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang mnyes par nus so/ /zhes thams cad gros gcig tu 'dus te/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dad par byas nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs

gzhon nu de legs par bskyed do/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rim gror ma ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis bkod par gyur te/ de la brgyad ni pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni nu ma snun pa'i ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni rtsen

grogs kyi ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te dpyad pa/ ji lta gzhon nu 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig tu 'gyur ram

'on te ma yin gyis rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang / de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la drang srong chen po nag po zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig snag gi tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba

dang lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las des byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul mang du mthong ste/ nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha'i bu mang po sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog cing gos kyi g.yab mo

g.yob pa dang / dga' zhing phan tshun 'dong ba mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ ma la bdag gis rnam par blta ba zhig tu bya 'am snyam nas/ des lha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bltas na ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de

na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan

pa zhig btsas par mthong nas/ bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u shes par gyis shig /'dzam bu'i gling du ni rin po che chen po byung ste/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i

khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsas so/ /de gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi

la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po srid kyi mthu stobs thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di

lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la bu stong

yod par 'gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' bskor dang bcas pa chad pa

med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med pa dang / chos dang 'thun par rang gi mthus zil gyis mnan cing mngon par phab ste/ dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro/ /de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na

yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na tshur shog de ltar 'dong

ngo / /de nas drang srong chen po nag po snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang 'grogs te/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha'i dkyil nas ldings te ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul brtul nas

rkang gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dong ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgor bsdad do/ /dge slong dag de ltar drang srong nag po des rgyal po zas

gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgo drung du srog chags brgya stong mang po 'dus pa mthong ngo / /de nas drang srong nag po sgo ba'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye mi khyod song la rgyal po zas gtsang ma la chab sgo na drang srong zhig

mchis so zhes gsol cig /de nas sgo ba des de ltar bgyi'o zhes drang srong nag po'i ltar mnyan te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang thal mo sbyar te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ chab sgo na drang srong rgan po 'khogs pa nas gzer ba zhig mchis te/ 'di skad du bdag ni rgyal po'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes mchi'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas

gtsang mas drang srong nag po'i stan 'ding du bcug ste/ mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong de nang du 'ong bar gyis shig /de nas mi de rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas/ drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces

smras te/ nang du bzhud cig /de nas drang srong nag po rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po rgyal bar

spyon cig /rgyal bar spyon cig /sku tshe ring bar srungs shig /chos bzhin du rgyal po mdzod cig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ drang srong nag po la yon chu dang rkang pa la gtor ba'i chus mchod pa byas te
shin du legs par yongs su bskur nas stan la bdar te/ de stan la bde bar 'dug par shes nas zhe sa dang bcas/ gus dang bcas par 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong sngon mthong bar mi dran na 'dir

ci la byon ci zhig bzhed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras shig bltam par gyur pa de lta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so/ /

rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po gzhon nu nyal zhing mchis kyis langs kyi bar du chung zad cig gzhes shig /drang srong gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni ring por mi nyal te/ skyes bu

dam pa de lta bu dag ni sad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas drang srong nag po de la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste sad pa'i brda' byas so/ /de nas rgyal po zas
gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa lag pa gnyis kyis shin du legs par blangs te/ drang srong nag po'i drung du khyer ro/ /de nas drang srong nag pos byang chub sems dpa' bltas na/ skyes bu

chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus legs par rnam par spras pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba las 'phags pa'i lus can nyi ma

brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ yan lag thams cad du mdzes pa mthong nas/ kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar gyis gang zag 'di byung ngo / /kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa'i gang

zag 'di byung ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs te/

sems shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa mthong ste/ de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/

gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur

ba dang / gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ba mthong nas/ des

de lta bu mthong ba dang / mchi ma blags te ngus nas shugs ring du phyung ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de mchi ma blags te ngus nas shugs ring du 'byin par mthong nas/ sngangs te mi dga' zhing rings par

rings par drang srong chen po de la smras pa/ drang srong de ltar bshum mo blags te bshums pa dang / shugs ring du 'byin pa ci zhig nongs/ gzhon nu 'di la mi dge ba 'am cig mi gda' 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang /

drang srong chen po nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po bdag ni gzhon nu'i slad du ngu ba yang ma lags/ 'di la mi dge ba yang gang yang ma mchis te/ bdag nyid ngu bar bas so/ /de

ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te nas gzer la gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya ste/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par bskor bar mi nus bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /lha

dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs

pa yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i mthar phyin pa'i chos yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /sems can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di las chos de thos nas/ skye ba las yongs su ma grol ba rnams grol bar 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin du sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre

sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mes gdungs pa rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi
char pas sim par mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs thibs pos khebs pa lam gol bar zhugs pa rnams ni lam drang por mya ngan las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/ sems can

'khor ba'i dra ba dang btson rar 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog gis mig ldong

pa rnams la ni shes rab kyi mig bskyed par 'gyur/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i zug rngus zug pa rnams la ni zug rngu 'byin par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog ni brgya la brgya lam na 'jig

rten du 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po de bzhin du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brgya la brgya lam na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de ltar gzhon nu 'di ni nges par bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol bar 'gyur zhing

'chi ba med pa la rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la/ bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog de mi mthong ba dang / bdag gi nad ma mchis pa 'di la yang 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni de'i slad du

ngu zhing mi dga' bas shugs ring du 'byin pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi bstan bcos las 'byung ba lta na ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe

na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni

dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang po 'di dang ldan no/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro dang rma bya'i

mgrin pa ltar mthon mthing du grub cing lcang lor 'khrir la g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / 'phral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes pa

ni kha ba dang dngul gyi mdog ltar mchis pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang / tshems

thags bzang ba dang / tshems shin du dkar ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin du ring zhing srab pa dang /

'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo shin du zlum pa dang / bdun mtho ba dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang / lpags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba dang / bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mor slebs pa dang / ro

stod seng ge'i lta bu dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / spu re re nas skyes pa dang / yan lag gi spu g.yas phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil ba dang /

mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / brla legs par zlum pa dang / byin pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po e na ya'i lta bu dang / sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / phyag dang
zhabs kyi mthil 'jam pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo re re
skyes pa ni bzang zhing rtsibs stong dang ldan la/ mu khyud dang bcas/ lte ba dang bcas pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zhabs mnyam zhing shin du gnas pa dang ldan pa

lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan no/ /rgyal po chen po mtshan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po

la mi 'byung ste/ mtshan de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu mchis te/ de dag dang ldan pas gzhon

nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di

lta ste rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sen mo mtho ba dang / sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang / sen mo mdog snum pa dang / sor mo rnams zlum pa dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / sor mo byin

gyis phra ba dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / tshigs mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po

gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni phyag gi ri mo mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang / phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang / phyag gi ri mo ya yor ma gyur pa dang / phyag gi ri mo rim par 'tsham pa dang /

sgros bim pa ltar dmar ba dang / sgra mi drag pa'i tshig dang / ljags mnyen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang / glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dang / snyan cing 'jam pa dang ldan

pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ phyag ring ba dang / sku'i na bza' gtsang ma phun sum tshogs pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga'

ba'i sku dang / zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / rim par 'tsham pa'i sku dang / shin du dpa' bar mdzes pa'i sku dang / rnam par legs par grub pa'i sku dang / pus mo'i lha nga yangs shing rgya che la shin du gang ba dang

ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sku zlum pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin du 'jam pa dang / sku ya yo ma mchis pa dang / sku rim gyis legs par grub pa dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba

ma yo ba dang / lte ba rim gyis gzhol ba dang / drang srong ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang / kun nas mdzes pa dang / snang ba dam pa shin du rnam par dag cing / rab rib ma mchis pa'i 'od kun nas 'byung ba dang ldan pa

lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni glang po ltar dal ba'i 'gros dang / seng ge'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / khyu mchog gi stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / ngang pa'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang /

g.yas phyogs su mdzes par 'khor ba'i 'gros dang / dku zlum pa dang / dku skabs phyin pa dang / dku ma rnyongs pa dang / rked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba dang / mdog gi nyes pa sngo ba 'am/ gnag pa'i skyon

dang bral ba'i sku dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba rno ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / shangs legs par mtho ba dang / spyan gsal

ba dang / spyan dri ma med pa dang / 'dzum pa'i spyan dang ldan pa dang / spyan ring ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / ud pa la sngon po lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad

grub pa ni smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin ma gnag pa dang / smin ma rgyun chags pa dang / smin ma rim gyis gzhol ba dang / mkhur ba rgyas pa dang / mkhur ba mi mnyam pa med pa

dang / mkhur ba skyon dang bral ba dang / sdang ba dang / khro ba'i mdog med pa dang / shin du rig pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni mdzod spu yongs su rdzogs pa dang

ldan pa dang / gdong dang dpral ba rkyen du 'bab pa dang / dbu yongs su rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mi bshor ba dang / dbu skra mi 'dzings pa dang / dbu skra byin

gyis phra ba dang / dbu skra lcang lor 'khril ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni dbu skra dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / sdong ris kyi dbyibs

lta bu'i dbu skra dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'di dag ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu ste/ de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur

gyis/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga'

zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing / /drang srong

rnams kyis mchod gyur te/ /'jig rten kun gyi mchod rten pas/ /bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po dang / snag gi tsha bo mis byin

dang bcas te/ kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas/ gos bskon te bskor ba byas so/ /de nas drang srong chen po nag po gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo / /de

nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mis byin khyod kyis nam sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes thos pa de'i tshe/ khyod song ste de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung shig dang / de ni khyod

kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha'i tshogs rnams nam mkha'i ngos la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgrog pa/ /lha yi drang srong nag po ri sul gnas pas mthong nas

dga' mchog thob/ /'di na srog chags rnams kyi dga' skyed sangs rgyas shes bya'i tshig 'di ci/ /bdag gi lus kyang rab sim gyur cing sems bde mchog tu zhi bar gyur/ /de lha 'am 'on te lha min yang na nam

mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci/ /sangs rgyas shes bya dga' dang mos byed tshig 'di sngon chad ma thos ci/ /lha yi mig gis phyogs bcur ri dang sa dang rgya mtsho rnams la bltas/ /phyis yang sa ri mtsho la rmad du byung

ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong / /'od gsal mdzes pa lus la sim byed 'di ni rab tu bzang snang zhing / /ji ltar ri yi rtse mo rnams su byi ru'i myu gu 'thon gyur la/ /shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bzang rgyas sna
tshogs 'bras bus brgyan gyur las/ /srid pa gsum du dkon mchog dam pa myur du 'byung bar shin du gsal/ /sa 'di thams cad mnyam zhing dri med lag mthil bzhin du snang ba dang / /lha rnams dga'

zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin gyur la/ /klu rgyal rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi steng na rin chen rmad 'byung 'phyo ba las/ /'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal ba'i dkon mchog chos kyi 'byung gnas nges par

'byung / /ngan song zhi zhing sdug bsngal bral te sems can rnams ni bder ldan la/ /lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i dkyil la dga' dang ldan par rgyu ba dang / /ji ltar lha yi glu dbyangs sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba

grag pa las/ /srid pa gsum 'dir dkon mchog 'byung 'gyur de yi ltas su gdon mi za/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir drang srong nag pos lha yi mig gis rnam bltas na/ /ser skya'i grong na rgyal po zas gtsang grong khyer

dam pa yod pa der/ /mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan dang bsod nams gzi brjid rgyas pa btsas pa mthong / /mthong nas dga' mgu rangs shing bde ba'i yid skyes mthu yang skyes par gyur/ /de nas ngo mtshar rnyed de

rang gi slob ma lhan cig rings su dong / /phyin nas ser skyar brjod pa'i rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog gi sgor 'dug ste/ /zhabs 'bring srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po drang srong des mthong nas/ /sgo ba de la smras

pa chab sgor drang srong phyin ces myur du gsol/ /de mnyan myur du pho brang nang phyin rgyal po la ni de bsnyad pa/ /lha cig drang srong rgan 'khogs dka' thub chen po can zhig chab sgor mchis/ /drang srong mchog de rgyal po'i

pho brang nang du mchi bar dga' zhes mchi/ /rgyal po chen po nang du btang ngam mi btang bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /de nas de yi stan bting rgyal pos khyod song nang du bos zhes bsgo/ /drang srong nag pos bsgo ba'i tshig thos

dga' mgu bde dang ldan par gyur/ /skom pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bkres pas gdungs pa zas la mos pa ltar/ /drang srong dam pa de yang sems can mchog de mthong du mngon par dga'/ /rgyal po rgyal gyur sku tshe ring bsrung

gsol zhes dga' bas de skad smras/ /snyan par brjod nas yid dul dbang po zhi zhing des pa stan la 'dug /rgyal pos gus par smra byas drang srong thub pa de la tshig brjod pa/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir byon rgyu ci thub

pas bdag la myur du gsungs/ /khyod kyi sras bltam gzugs mchog pha rol phyin cing gzi brjid che dang ldan/ /mthu chen mtshan rab sum bcu gnyis kyis kun nas rgyan mnga' ba/ /rgyal po khyod sras thams cad don grub

de ni mthong bar bdag dga' ste/ /de slad 'dir mchis rgyal po bdag la 'tshal ba gzhan ni yod ma mchis/ /legs so legs par byon te mnyel tam ma mnyel khyod mthong bdag dga'o/ /mchog sbyin gzhon nu de nyal da

ltar blta ba'i skabs ni ma mchis kyis/ /re shig yud tsam gzhes dang 'dir ni zla ba nya ba dri med pa/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'dra ba'i dri med gzigs par 'gyur/ /gang tshe kha lo sgyur mchog zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od

mnga' de sad pa/ /de tshe rgyal pos 'od 'bar gzugs 'chang nyi las 'phags 'od pang blangs te/ /'di ltar drang srong lha mis mchod pa gser mchog gzugs ldan da gzigs shig /drang srong nag pos de yi rkang pa mdzes
pa 'khor lo'i mtshan can mthong / /de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ /bdag nyid chen po bstan bcos mkhas pas pang du blangs nas bsams shing bltas/ /des ni mthu chen
mthu ldan mtshan gyi mchog gis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/ /mgo gcogs rig byed bstan bcos mkhas pa des ni de la rnam gnyis mthong / /stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am sangs rgyas 'jig rten

gtso bor 'gyur/ /shin du mi dga' lus dang sems kyis mchi ma blags te shugs ring phyung / /rgyal po mchog kyang sngangs par gyur nas bram ze ci slad bshums shes smra/ /drang srong nag pos bdag gi don grub bgegs
shig ma gzigs sam/ drang srong ci slad bshums mdzad dge sdig gang gzigs bdag la mad par gsungs/ /khyod sras don kun grub la bar chad sdig tu 'gyur ba ma mchis te/ /bdag la bdag nyid rgas shing
'di ltar 'khogs par gyur ces mya ngan bgyid/ /'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten mchog 'gyur chos kyang yang dag ston par 'gyur/ /bdag gis dga' ba thob pas yid kyis mi mthong ngo zhes de slad du/ /

'di yi sku la mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis dri med mnga' ba las/ /rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te gsum du ma mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdzod/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 'gyur yang na sangs rgyas 'jig rten

gtso bor byon/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhed par mi 'gyur nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /drang srong lung bstan de thos rgyal po dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur/ /de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis

la phyag kyang byas/ /stobs mchog ldan pa khyod ni lhas mchod drang srong rnams kyis bsngags pa ste/ /srid gsum kun gyi 'gro ba'i ded dpon mchog gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong dga' bas tsha bo

de la smras pa nga yi gdams ngag nyon/ /gang tshe 'di ni byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro la 'khor lo skor thos pa/ /de tshe myur du thub pa'i bstan la rab byung mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /drang srong dam pa de yis rkang la phyag

'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni/ /'di 'dra'i sras mnga' khyod kyi thob pa rgya chen legs par thob ces smras/ /'di ni 'jig rten lha dang mir bcas chos kyis tshim par mdzad par 'gyur/ /drang srong mchog de ser skya'i
gnas nas byung nas bdag gnas dgon par phyin/ /'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po drug pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems

dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bos te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bskal pa bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / thos pa dang / spyod pa dang / brtul zhugs

dang / dka' thub can spyad pa legs par spyad pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa/ btang snyoms kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i blo can/ sems can thams cad la phan par

brtson pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha legs par bgos pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas byung ba/ bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ rtul ba nges par byas pa dang ldan pa/
pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/ dga' ba'i bsam pa shin du dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa/ ye shes chen po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan can/ bdud kyi stobs mthar 'byin pa/ stong gsum gyi ded dpon

chen po/ lha dang mis mchod pa/ mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin byas pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs shin du phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ 'byung ba'i bsam pa can/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar 'byin pa/

legs par skye bas skyes pa/ 'gro ba rnam par byang chub par byed pa de/ bu ram shing pa'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes nas mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste/ de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgyas tshur shog /bdag cag de la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / mngon par bstod par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /lha'i bu nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa gzhan dag kyang bdag cag

byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de dag kyang nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa gtong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gro dang bkur sti byed par bya ba'i phyir

'dong ngo / /de ni lha'i bu de dag la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'chi ba med pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma rgyal ba 'phel ba yang rjes su bsgrags par 'gyur ro/ /

byang chub sems dpa' yang de kho na'i lung bstan pas lung bstan te bdag cag phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bsgo nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas

ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad 'od kyis rgyas par bkang ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / sgo bas rgyal po la gsol te/ rgyal pos gnang nas rgyal po'i pho brang

du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs te rgyal po zas gtsang

ma la dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po dgyes pa'i dam pas dgyes par mdzod cig /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos

legs par brgyan pa dang / gzhon nus lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / grags pa dang / dpal gyi zil gyis non pa las na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems

dpa' ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mang po dang

lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro chen po byas te/ de kho na'i lung bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas phyir bdag gi gnas su song ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yon tan

rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa de bltam pa/ /lha yi dbang pos shes nas dga' ste lha la smras/ /de thos 'gyur ba'ang bskal pa bye mang shin du dka'/ /tshur shog mi yi dbang po de la mchod du 'deng / /rin chen nor bus gtsug ni

legs brgyan spyod lam ldan/ /gtsug pud mdzes pa 'phyang ba rnam par dag pa'i lha/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba ser skya'i gnas mchog tu/ /myur du lhag nas rgyal po'i sgo yi drung na sdod/ /de dag rnams kyis

sgo ba la ni yid 'ong smras/ /rgyal po'i pho brang song ste thugs su chud par gsol/ /chab sgo bas kyang tshig de mnyan nas nang du song / /thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /lhan cig rtag tu rgyal gyur sku tshe

ring du srungs/ /bsod nams yangs pa rnam dag 'od can chab sgor mchis/ /rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan/ /zla ba nya ltar bzhin bzang zla ltar dri med 'od/ /rgyal po de dag gang du

mchi yang grib mi gda'/ /sug pa 'dor yang gom pa'i sgra dag thos mi 'gyur/ /dog sar rgyu ba bgyid kyang rdul ni yong mi ldang / /skye bo rnams kyang de dag mthong na ngoms mi 'gyur/ /de dag lus kyi 'od ni shin du rgya
chen gsal/ /tshig kyang yid du mchis te mi la dpe ma mchis/ /zab cing 'jam mnyen snyan pa 'byung ba'i gnas/ /de dag mi ma lags kyi lha tshogs lags snyam bgyid/ /me tog mchog phreng byug pa dar gyi
lda ldi dag /kun gyi lag na thogs nas gus dang bcas par sdod/ /rgyal po lha rnams de dag gzhon nu lha yi lha/ /blta bar 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i slad du mchis su des/ /rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab

tu dgar gyur nas/ /song ste kun kyang pho brang nang du gshegs shes gyis/ /de dag yon tan spyod lam khyod kyis smras ltar na/ /rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba ni mi la gang yang med/ /sgo bas thal mo sbyar te lha la 'di skad
smras/ /rgyal pos gnang gis khyed cag nang du bzhud du gsol/ /lag na phreng thogs de dag dga' mgu yi rangs te/ /lha yi gnas dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs/ /lha mchog de dag khyim

du phyin par mthong nas ni/ /rgyal po stan las langs te thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /rin chen rtsa ba can gyi khri gdan bshams pa 'dir/ /thugs brtse mdzad pa'i thugs kyis khyed cag bzhugs su gsol/ /nga rgyal dregs
med de dag stan la 'khod par gyur/ /bdag cag ci slad 'dir mchis rgyal po gsan du gsol/ /khyod sras rnam dag sku mnga' bsod nams chen po bltam/ /shin du legs pa'i zhabs ldan bdag cag mthong bar

'tshal/ /gang gi 'gro ba gang dang sbyor ba gang cir 'gyur/ /mtshan bzang mtshan gyi cho ga dag ni bdag cag 'tshal/ /de bas rgyal po'i dam pa mi dgyes spang bar mdzod/ /sna tshogs mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa

blta bar 'tshal/ /rgyal po bud med tshogs kyis bskor ba de rab dga'/ /gzhon nu me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba pang tu blangs/ /lha mchog gtsug phud 'phyang ba dag ni nye bar bsnyen/ /thog ma sgor byung stong gsum 'di

dag kun du g.yos/ /lha mchog de dag 'dren pa'i zhabs dang sen mo ni/ /zangs mdog dri med rnam dag gzi brjid ldan mthong nas/ /gtsug pud 'phyang ba de dag myur du langs par gyur/ /dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis
zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'drar lta ba dpal can dang / /'di 'dra'i bsod nams gzi brjid spyi gtsug mi mthong dang / /mdzod spu nas ni rgya chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dra las/ /
bdud rnams pham mdzad byang chub brnyes 'gyur gdon mi 'tshal/ /mun sel nyon mongs bral ba'i yon tan brtags nas su/ /yang dag yon tan ji ltar don mthong de la bstod/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi dang nyon
mongs dgra bsal ba'i/ /sems can rin chen 'di ni ring por mi thogs 'byung / /yongs rtog 'dod chags yul gyi gtsub mas bskyed pa yi/ /rnam gsum mes ni srid gsum kun 'bar yongs gdungs par/ /dpa'

khyod chos kyi sprin gyis stong gsum bkang nas ni/ /'chi med char gyis nyon mongs gdung ba zhi mdzad 'gyur/ /byams pa'i gsung mnga' thugs rje ldan pa 'jam pa'i gsung / /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong
gsung du sgrog mdzad pa/ /stong gsum kun du go zhing 'gro ba gor 'gyur ba/ /bcom ldan khyod kyis sangs rgyas gsung chen myur du sgrogs/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags bcings bying srid pa'i rtser gnas pa/ /mu

stegs can gyi tshogs ngan log par lta ba bcom/ /khyod kyi rgyu la brten dang stong ba'i chos thos nas/ /seng ges wa tshogs bzhin du de dag 'byer bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs chen po'i du ba ma rig bsgribs bsal

te/ /kun du byung ba skye bo nges par snang byed pa'i/ /ye shes 'od 'phro shes rab 'od rig gzigs pa yis/ /'gro ba kun gyi mun pa chen po bsal bar gsol/ /gang du sems can dag pa rmad byung 'di 'dra byung / /
lha dang mi rnams kyis ni rnyed pa rgya chen thob/ /rnam par rtogs par mdzad pa'i sems can rin chen 'dis/ /ngan song lam bcad lha yi lam ni gtod par 'gyur/ /ser skya'i gnas su lha yi me tog char phab

nas/ /bskor ba byas te gus par bstod pa byas nas ni/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas legs shes de dag tshig rjod cing / /lha tshogs de dag tshul du shis par mkha' las dong / /bltam pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //
dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang gi nub mo btsas pa de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing

sA la chen po lta bu rnams su bu mo nyi khri btsas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang de dag gi pha ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo/ /rgyal po

zas gtsang mas kyang bu mo nyi khri byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo/ /mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang byang chub sems

dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo/ /blon po'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo/ /dge slong dag de'i tshe
shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu 'di ni lha khang du bkur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/

gzhon nu de ltar bkur ba legs kyis de bas na grong khyer ni brgyan par gyis shig /srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / mdo sum dang / tshong 'dus dag ni mdzes par gyis shig /bkra mi shis pa sgur po dang / zhar

ba dang / 'on pa dang / lkug pa dang / dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni sol cig /bkra shis pa rnams kyang sogs shig /bsod nams kyi rnga ni rdungs shig /bkra shis kyi dril ni dkrol cig /grong

khyer dam pa'i sgo ni rgyan gyis legs par spud cig /rol mo sil snyan dang pheg brdab pa shin du yid du 'ong ba dag ni long zhing rdobs shig /khams kyi rgyal po thams cad ni sogs shig /tshong dpon dang /

khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi mi dag ni gcig tu bsdus shig /bu mo'i shing rta ni shoms shig /bum pa gang ba rnams ni snyen cig /bram ze kha ton pa rnams ni sdus shig /lha khang rnams

ni shin du brgyan par gyis shig /dge slong dag de nas rgyal pos ji skad bsgo ba de bzhin du thams cad sbyar ba dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma rang gi khyim du song nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mI la bos

te 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu lha khang du bkur gyis rgyan gyis legs par brgyan par gyis shig /legs so zhes skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mIs de ltar mnyan te/ gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /

de nas gzhon nu de rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pas shin du yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis sru mo la smras pa/ ma bdag gang du bkur/ smras pa/ bu lha khang du bkur ro/ /de nas gzhon nus bzhin

'dzum ste bgad nas sru mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag btsas de tshe stong gsum 'di ni g.yos par gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs pa lha min lto 'phye chen po dang / /nyi zla de bzhin rnam thos bu dang gzhon nu
yang / /spyi bo rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag 'tshal na/ /de ring ma yis gang du bdag bkur bgyi ba yi/ /lha gzhan bdag gi gong na 'phags pa gang zhig mchis/ /lha rnams kun las bdag 'phags lha
yi lha lags te/ /bdag 'dra'i lha yang ma mchis gong ma ga la mchis/ /'on kyang 'jig rten rjes bsnyag tsam du bdag mchi'o/ /bdag gi rnam 'phrul skye bos mthong na dgar 'gyur zhing / /rim gro
bkur sti shin du che bar bgyid 'gyur la/ /lha mis 'di ni lha yi lha zhes rig par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag de ltar grong khyer du gzhon nu'i shing rta bshams te rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ bkra shis thams cad

bshams te rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu pang du blangs nas/ bram ze dang / grong rdal pa dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / mdza'
bshes dang / nye dus bskor te/ srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / mdo sum dang / tshong 'dus rgyan tshad med pas brgyan pa dag nas bdug spos dri zhim pos ni bdugs/ me tog sil ma ni gtor/ rta dang

glang po che dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang gi bun long ni cher gyur/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra ni phyung ste/ song bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha brgya stong dag gis byang chub

sems dpa'i shing rta drangs te/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char phab ste/ sil snyan sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas rgyal po'i bkod pa chen

po dang / rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i byin chen pos gzhon nu de khyer te lha khang du phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas lha khang der rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthil bzhag pa dang / de nas lha'i

gzugs sems med pa de dag 'di lta ste/ gu lang dang / skem byed dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad

kyang rang rang gi gnas nas langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong ni kye ma a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra brgya stong mang po 'byin par gyur to/ /
