ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa de thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /lha'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/ /lha'i sil snyan brgya stong du ma dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /lha gang

dag gi gzugs gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi gzugs bstan nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra bar gyur to/ /ri rgyal ri mchog ri rab nam yang yungs kar 'bru la phyag mi 'tshal/ /rgya mtsho

klu rje gnas ni nam yang ba rjes chu la phyag mi 'tshal/ /nyi zla 'od byed srin bu me khyer 'od byed de la phyag mi 'tshal/ /bsod nams shes rab rigs byung legs ldan lha rnams gang la 'ang phyag mi bzhes/ /yungs 'bru

ba rjes chu dang srin bu me khyer 'dra bar gyur pa ni/ /stong gsum 'di na lha mi gang yang rung ste nga rgyal gnas pa lags/ /ri rab rgya mtsho nyi zla 'dra ba 'jig rten rang byung dam pa ste/ /de la 'jig rten phyag 'tshal ba ni

mtho ris mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha khang du zhugs pa de bstan pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /
dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' lha khang du khyer ba'i tshe btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i rkyen ni de yin/ rgyu ni de yin no/ /lha khang du khyer ba'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// //

dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na 'don 'char po zhes bya ba 'char 'gro'i pha/ bram ze lnga brgya tsam gyis bskor te/ skar ma me bzhi 'das nas nag pa la bab pa'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du phyin nas 'di

skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ da ni gzhon nu'i rgyan mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ legs kyis byed du chug shig /de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya lnga brgya

tsam gyis/ rgyan gyi rnam pa lnga brgya tsam byed du bcug ste/ 'di ltar lag pa'i rgyan dag dang / rkang pa'i rgyan dag dang / mgo'i rgyan dag dang / mgul gyi rgyan dag dang / sor gdub dag dang / rna rgyan dag dang / dpung

rgyan dag dang / gser gyi ska rags dag dang / gser skud dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dag dang / rin po che'i dra ba dag dang / lham rin po ches spras pa dag dang / do shal rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan

pa dag dang / gdu bu rgyan can dag dang / mgul gdub dag dang / cod pan dag kyang byed du bcug ste zin nas/ skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/ shAkya de dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du dong nas 'di skad

ces smras so/ /lha gzhon nu brgyan du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed kyis gzhon nu la brgyan pa dang / mchod pa byas pas chog gis/ ngas gzhon nu'i rgyan thams cad byed du bcug go/ /smras pa/ bdag cag
gi rgyan 'di dag gzhon nu'i sku la gdugs mtshan bdun zhig gdags su gsol/ de ltar gnang na bdag cag gis sug las bgyis pa yang don mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe nam langs te nyi ma shar ba dang /

byang chub sems dpa' bskyed mos tshal bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba der zhugs so/ /de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mIs byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs so/ /bud med brgyad khris kyang

byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /bu mo stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste/ gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /shAkya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa'

bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /bram ze lnga stong yang lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'i gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya bas rgyan ji snyed cig byas pa de
dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus la btags te/ de dag lus la btags ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis mog mog por gyur nas lam mer ma gyur/ lhan ner ma gyur/ lhang nger

ma gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag tsa'i yug bzhag na lam mer mi rung / lhan ner mi rung / lhang nger mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du rgyan de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od

kyis phog na lam mer mi rung / lhan ner mi rung / lhang nger mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du rgyan gyi rnam pa gang dang gang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la btags pa de dang de dag mog mog por gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/

'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag tsa yug bzhag pa bzhin no/ /de'i tshe bskyed mos tshal gyi lha mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa des lus chen po bstan nas mdun du 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang
shAkya'i tshogs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ stong gsum sa 'di grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa kun/ /gal te gser gyis gang khyab dri med mdzes gyur kyang / /'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gzegs
gcig gis zil rlag ste/ /gser gzhan dag ni dpal dang bral zhing gsal mi 'gyur/ /sa 'di mtha' dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser khebs kyang / /'dren pa dpal rgyas spu khung 'od phyung zil gyis non/ /
mi snang mi gsal mi mdzes 'od kyang nyams gyur cing / /bde gshegs skyob pa'i drung na snag tsa bzhin du 'gyur/ /yon tan brgyas gang 'di ni rang gi gzi yis brgyan/ /de ni rgyan gyis mdzes min

shin du dri med sku/ /nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma nor bu me dag dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od kyang dpa' stug mdun mi gsal/ /gang sku sngon gyi dge ba'i 'bras bus mtshan spras pa/ /de la gzhan gyis
byas pa'i rgyan phal ci zhig dgos/ /rgyan rnams phrol 'or mi mkhas mkhas mdzad ma gtse shig /blo gros mchog mdzad 'di ni bcos ma'i rgyan mi bzhed/ /'dun pa de ni rgyal khab sras dang lhan
cig btsas/ /dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams 'bangs de stsol/ /shAkya'i rigs ni rgya chen mchog tu 'gyur snyam nas/ /shAkya dag ni yid dga' mgu zhing ngo mtshar gyur/ /lha mo des
de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i me tog dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /rgyan gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //

dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de ya zad skyes pa dang / bkra shis brgya stong byas nas khye'u stong phrag bcu dang / bu mo stong phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te yi ge'i grwar 'jug par byas so/ /

bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang bas gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu dang / gser dngul dang / dbyig gis gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu drangs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang dang /
grong bar dang / tshong 'dus kyi phyogs gang yin pa dag tu gtor to/ /mngon par byin no/ /sil snyan 'bum phrag brgyad kyi sgra yang phyung zhing me tog gi char chen po yang bab po/ /stegs bu dang /
sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dag gi steng nas/ bu mo brgya stong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag /byang chub sems
dpa' la lta zhing me tog dag 'thor bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo stong phrag brgyad ni rgyan rnams kyis lhug lhug por brgyan te/ rin po che bzang byed thogs nas lam 'phyag cing byang chub sems dpa'i

mdun nas 'dong bar gyur to/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang lus phyed phyung zhing nam mkha'i
dkyil nas me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi bre bar gyur to/ /shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas 'dong bar gyur te/ bkod pa'i rnam
pa 'di lta bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs ma thag tu de nas/ byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bas byang chub
sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod de/ khas bub tu sgyel to/ /de ltar sgyel ba dang dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu yan lag bzang po zhes bya bas mthong nas/ lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste
bslang ngo / /bslang nas kyang de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang skye bo phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi yi 'jig rten 'di na bstan bcos gang yod pa/ /

grangs dang yi ge rtsis dang khams kyi rgyud dag dang / /'jig rten bzo yi sbyor ba tshad med mang po dag /bskal pa bye mang sngon chad 'dis ni de dag bslabs/ /'on kyang skye bo'i rjes su 'thun pa tsam mdzad de/ /
byis pa mang po theg pa mchog la smin mdzad dang / /sems can khrag khrig gzhan yang 'chi med dgod pa'i phyir/ /shin du lobs pa'ang bslab phyir yi ge'i grwar zhugs so/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i bden
bzhi lam gyi tshul mkhyen cing / /rgyu la brten nas ji ltar 'byung ba de la'ang mkhas/ /ji ltar 'dus byas 'gags zad bsil 'gyur de tshul yang / /mkhyen na yi ge'i bstan bcos tsam lta cis mi mkhyen/ /
'jig rten gsum na 'di yi slob dpon gong na med/ /lha dang mir bcas nang na 'di nyid gtso bo ste/ /bskal pa bye mang sngon chad gang la 'dis bslabs pa'i/ /yi ge de dag ming yang khyed kyis shes mi
'gyur/ /'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud sna tshogs gang 'byung ba/ /skad cig gcig gis sems can dag pa 'dis mkhyen te/ /gzugs med ltar mi snang ba'i tshul yang rab mkhas na/ /yi ge gzugs yod
bltar snang dag lta smos ci dgos/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog mang pos gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas ma ma dang bran mo'i 'khor

bkod de/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sogs pa shAkya gzhan ni phyir dong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa'i yi ge'i shing lha'i tshon gyis byug pa/ gser gyi yang mig gis
btags pa/ mtha' ma nor bu rin po ches kun nas brgyan pa thogs te/ slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye mkhan pos bdag la yi ge gang zhig bslab/ tshangs pa'i yi ge 'am/
kha rosti'i yi ge 'am/ pad ma'i snying po'i yi ge 'am/ ang ga'i yi ge 'am/ yul ma ga d+hA'i yi ge 'am/ bkra shis pa'i yi ge 'am/ sor mo pa'i yi ge 'am/ sha ka ni'i yi ge 'am/ ya ba na'i yi ge 'am/
bag le ba'i yi ge 'am/ pa ru sha'i yi ge 'am/ 'gro lding ba'i yi ge 'am/ ki ra ta'i yi ge 'am/ lho phyogs pa'i yi ge 'am/ drag shul can gyi yi ge 'am/ grangs kyi yi ge 'am/ spyi'u tshugs pa'i yi ge
'am/ rjes su 'thun pa'i yi ge 'am/ bru sha'i yi ge 'am/ ka sha'i yi ge 'am/ rgya'i yi ge 'am/ phu na'i yi ge'am/ hu na'i yi ge 'am/ yi ge 'bring dang / rgyas par bri ba'i yi ge 'am/ rgyal gyi yi ge
'am/ lha'i yi ge 'am/ klu'i yi ge 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi yi ge 'am/ dri za'i yi ge 'am/ mi 'am ci'i yi ge 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i yi ge 'am/ lha ma yin gyi yi ge 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi yi ge

'am/ ri dgas kyi 'khor lo ba'i yi ge 'am/ khwa skad shes pa'i yi ge 'am/ sa bla'i lha'i yi ge 'am/ bar snang gi lha'i yi ge 'am/ nub kyi ba glang spyod kyi yi ge 'am/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi yi ge 'am/
shar gyi lus 'phags po'i yi ge 'am/ gdeg pa'i yi ge 'am/ gzhag pa'i yi ge 'am/ bsnan pa'i yi ge 'am/ rgya mtsho'i yi ge 'am/ rdo rje'i yi ge 'am/ spring yig dang / lan gyi yi ge 'am/ rnam 'thor
gyi yi ge 'am/ rings med kyi yi ge 'am/ bstan bcos bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/ rtsis bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/ gdeg pa bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/ gzhag pa bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/ rkang pas bris pa'i yi
ge 'am/ tshig lan lan gnyis su gdab pa'i tshig gi mtshams kyi yi ge 'am/ tshig gi mtshams bcur brgyud pa'i bar gyi yi ge 'am/ bla thabs su bsnan pa'i yi ge 'am/ sgra thams cad kun du sdud pa'i
yi ge 'am/ rig pa dang 'thun pa'i yi ge 'am/ rnam par 'dres pa'i yi ge 'am/ drang srong gi dka' thub spyad pa'i yi ge 'am/ lha nges pa'i yi ge 'am/ sa blta ba'i yi ge 'am/ nam mkha' blta ba'i yi ge

'am/ sman thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i yi ge 'am/ snying po thams cad kun du sdud pa'i yi ge 'am/ 'byung po thams cad kyi sgra sdud pa'i yi ge 'am/ kye slob dpon yi ge drug bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang
nas bdag la gang bslab/ de nas byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen ngo mtshar du gyur nas bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung ste/ nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa med par byas nas tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can dag pa ngo mtshar che/ /bstan bcos kun las bslabs gyur kyang / /'jig rten 'jig rten rjes snyag phyir/ /yi ge'i grwar ni byon par gyur/ /yi ge gang gi
ming dag kyang / /bdag gis shes par ma gyur pa/ /de la 'di la byang gyur kyang / /yi ge slob pa'i grwar byon to/ /'di yi zhal ni mthong mod kyi/ /spyi gtsug 'phags pa bltar mi snang / /yi ge'i shes
rab mthar phyin na/ /bdag gis 'di go ji ltar bslab/ /lha yi lha chen lha 'di ni/ /lha rnams kun gyi mchog mkhas pa/ /khyad par 'phags shing mnyam pa med/ /'jig rten gang zag do zla med/ /

bdag kyang 'di nyid mthu yis na/ /shes rab thabs kyi khyad par gyis/ /'jig rten kun kyi dpung gnyen po/ /lobs pa 'di ni bslab par bya/ /dge slong dag de ltar byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag byang chub sems

dpa' dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob cing gang gi tshe/ a zhes brjod pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i sgra byung ngo / /A zhes

brjod pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra byung ngo / /i zhes brjod pa dang dbang po shin du yangs pa'i sgra byung ngo / /I zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni yams kyi nad mang ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /u zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni 'tshe

ba mang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /U zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni dma' ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /e zhes brjod pa dang / nyes pa ni btsal ba las byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ai zhes brjod pa dang

'phags pa'i lam ni dge'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /o zhes brjod pa dang chu bo las rgal ba'i sgra byung ngo / /au zhes brjod pa dang rdzub pa'i sgra byung ngo / /aM zhes brjod pa dang bdag gi ba mi 'byung zhes bya

ba'i sgra byung ngo / /aHzhes brjod pa dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ka zhes brjod pa dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /kha zhes brjod pa dang chos thams cad nam mkha'

dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ga zhes brjod pa dang chos zab ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /g+ha zhes brjod pa dang ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang ling thog stug po bsal zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /

nga zhes brjod pa dang yan lag rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /tsa zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sgra byung ngo / /tsha zhes brjod pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang ba'i sgra byung ngo / /dza

zhes brjod pa dang rga shi las yang dag par 'das pa'i sgra byung ngo / /dz+ha zhes brjod pa dang 'chi byed kyi rgyal mtshan can gyi dpung tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /nya zhes brjod pa dang shes par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo / /Ta

zhes brjod pa dang lam shin tu chad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /Tha zhes brjod pa dang dri ba bzhag pa'i sgra byung ngo / /Da zhes brjod pa dang dkrugs ma dang bdud tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /D+ha zhes brjod pa dang yul

mi gtsang ba'i sgra byung ngo / /Na zhes brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa ni phra ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ta zhes brjod pa dang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres pa med ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /tha zhes brjod pa dang mthu

stobs dang shugs dang mi 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo / /da zhes brjod pa dang sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa'i sgra byung ngo / /d+ha zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa rnams kyi nor ni rnam

pa bdun no zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /na zhes brjod pa dang ming dang gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /pa zhes brjod pa dang don dam pa'i sgra byung ngo / /pha zhes brjod pa dang 'bras bu rnyed pa

mngon du bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ba zhes brjod pa dang bcings pa las rnam par thar pa'i sgra byung ngo / /b+ha zhes brjod pa dang srid pa 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo / /ma zhes brjod pa dang nga rgyal dang rgyags pa zhi bar

bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ya zhes brjod pa dang chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ra zhes brjod pa dang dga' ba la dga' ba med pa'i don dam par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /la zhes brjod

pa dang 'khri shing chad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /wa zhes brjod pa dang theg pa mchog gi sgra byung ngo / /sha zhes brjod pa dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra byung ngo / /Sha zhes brjod pa dang skye mched drug gzhom

zhing mngon par shes pa drug dang ye shes thob pa'i sgra byung ngo / /sa zhes brjod pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ha zhes brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa

bcom zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra byung ngo / /k+Sha zhes brjod pa dang yi ge'i mthar phyin te/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /de ltar byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob pa'i tshe/

byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa byung bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwa na 'dug pa'i tshe byis pa sum khri nyis stong rim gyis bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' logs par gyur kyang yi ge'i grwar 'jug pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/ /rkyen ni de yin no/ /yi ge bstan pa'i le'u ste
bcu pa'o// // dge slong dag gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu de gzhon nu gzhan dag dang zhang blon gyi bu dag dang lhan cig tu zhing pa'i grong lta zhing

dong ste/ grong bltas nas zhing blas kyi mtha'i bskyed mos tshal zhig tu phyin to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med par pha zad 'khyam zhing song song ba dang / 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa mdzes
pa blta na sdug pa zhig mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ /'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig pa rnyed de rnyed nas kyang sdig pa mi dge

ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing
nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga'
ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang
snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub

pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de'i tshe phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga yod pa rdzu

'phrul dang ldan pa nam mkha' las dong ba lnga zhig lho phyogs nas byang phyogs logs su dong dong ba las de dag tshal stug po de'i steng du phyin pa dang / phyir phul ba ltar 'dong ma nus nas/ de dag mi dga' zhing ba spu
g.yos te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /bdag cag 'di na ri rab nor bu rdo rje brtsegs ri shin du rngams stug pa yang thal phyung ste/ /glang po a mra'i shing rlon yal gas gzings pa mang po bcom
nas 'gro bzhin dong dong la/ /bdag cag 'di na lha yi khyim la 'ang thogs med gnod sbyin dri za'i khyim steng nam mkhar gnas gnas na/ /tshal stug 'dir phyin nas ni sgyid lug gyur pa su yi mthu zhig
gis na rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog gyur/ /de nas tshal stug po de na lha mo zhig gnas pa des drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal po'i gtso bo'i rigs byung shAkya'i rgyal sras

nyi ma shar ba lta bur rab tu snang ba'i 'od/ /'jig rten gtso bo mkhas pa zla zhal pad ma rgyas pa'i snying po'i kha dog lta bur rab mdzes pa/ /lha dang klu dbang gnod sbyin dri zas mchod pa de ni bsam gtan
dgongs shing tshal stug 'di na bzhugs/ /srid pa bye ba brgya dag tu ni bsod nams spel ba de yi mthu yis rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog go/ /de nas de dag gis 'og logs su bltas pa dang / gzhon nu
zhig dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba mthong nas 'di dag 'di snyam du su zhig 'di ltar gnas/ nor gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu 'am cig ma yin nam/ 'on te 'dod pa'i dbang po bdud lta 'am/ yang

na lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ 'on te dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba 'am/ yang na gu lang ngam/ grul bum gyi bdag po 'am/ 'on te spro ba chen po dang ldan pa nag po 'am/ 'on te lha'i bu zla ba 'am/ 'on te 'od
zer stong dang ldan pa'i nyi ma 'am/ 'on te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig yin nam/ su zhig snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ /gzhon nu 'di ni rnam thos bu'i gzugs
las 'phags par gsal bar snang bas na/ /'di ni sgra gcan yin nam 'on te rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs sam nyi zla'i gzugs/ /'dod mchog dbang po'i gzugs sam gu lang gzugs sam
'on te nag po'i gzugs yin nam/ /yang na 'di ni dpal ldan yan lag mtshan spras sdig med sangs rgyas 'gyur ba zhig /de nas tshal gyi lha mo des drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de
smras pa/ rnam thos bu dang mig stong bdog la dpal ni gang yod gyur pa dang / /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lha min dbang la dpal ni gang yod dang / /mi mjed bdag po tshangs dang gza' rnams la yang

dpal ni gang yod pa/ /dpal de shAkya'i sras po 'di drung phyin na gang gi char mi phod/ /de nas drang srong de dag gis lha mo de'i tshig thos nas sa la babs pa dang / de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mi
g.yo ba'i lus kyis bsam gtan byed cing / me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba mthong nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' la sems shing tshigs su bcad pas bstod de/ de la gcig gis smras pa/ 'jig
rten nyon mongs mes gdungs pa/ /mtsho 'di rab tu byung gyur te/ /gang gis 'jig rten sim 'gyur ba'i/ /chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ mi shes rab rib 'jig rten du/ /
sgron ma 'di ni rab tu byung / /gang gis 'gro ba snang 'gyur ba'i/ /chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ mya ngan rgya mtsho 'dal ba la/ /gru yi dam pa 'di byung ste/ /gang gis
'gro ba sgrol 'gyur ba'i/ /chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ nyon mongs 'ching bas bcings pa la/ /'grol bar mdzad pa 'di byung ste/ /gang gis 'gro ba
'grol 'gyur ba'i/ /chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ rga dang nad kyis gzir ba la/ /sman pa dam pa 'di byung ste/ /gang gis rga shi thar bya ba'i/ /chos de 'di yis
brnyes par 'gyur/ /de nas drang srong de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' las dong ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang
ma yang byang chub sems dpa' mi mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa' med pas mi dga' ste/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu de mi snang na gar song / de'i tshe skye bo phal po che gzhon nu tshol du dong dong ba

dang / de'i tshe blon po gcig cig gis byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /des de'i tshe shing thams cad kyi grib ma ni yol na/ 'dzam bu'i

shing gi grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus mi gtong bar 'dug par mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rings shing myur ba myur ba'i

gzugs kyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i thad du phyin te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal po gzhon nu de la gzigs/ /'dzam bu'i shing grib bsam gtan mdzad/ /brgya byin tshangs pa ji bzhin du/ /gzi
brjid dpal gyis rab tu mdzes/ /zhugs shing gang gi grib ma la/ /mtshan rab mnga' ba de bzhugs pa'i/ /grib ma des ni de ma btang / /skyes mchog bsam gtan mdzad la sgrib/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma

'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de mthong ba dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /ri yi spo la me 'bar 'dra ba ste/ /zla ba skar

ma'i tshogs nang 'dug 'dra zhing / /gzi brjid sgron 'dra bsam gtan byed mthong na/ /nga yi lus 'di shin du 'dar bar gyur/ /de skad ces smras nas/ des byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag byas te/ tshigs su

bcad pa 'di smras so/ /thub pa gang tshe bltam pa dang / /gang tshe 'od ldan bsam gtan mdzad/ /'dren pa 'di ltar lan gnyis su/ /mgon po khyod zhabs phyag 'tshal lo/ /de'i tshe byis pa khre'u thogs pa dag

ca co'i sgra 'byin par gyur nas/ de dag la blon po dag gis sgra ma che sgra ma che zhes byas pa dang / de dag ci zhig nongs shes zer ro/ /blon po dag gis smras pa/ rgyal po'i sras don thams cad grub pa dge ba'i mtshan

bzang po mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing 'od 'dom gang ba mnga' ba 'di ri ltar mi g.yo zhing bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshe/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yol te song yang / shing gi grib ma de ma yol zhing sgrib par gnas so/ /

de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dpyid 'das dbyar gyi dus bab dbyar zla ra ba la/ me tog rgyas shing me tog yal gas khebs gyur te/ /khrung khrung rma bya ne tso ri skegs skad 'byin pa/ /shAkya'i bu dag phal cher mngon du
'dong bar gyur/ /'dun pa can gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu nags tshal dag ni gzigs pa mdzad slad du/ /byis pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor te gshegs pa'i rigs/ /bram ze lta bur khyim na bzhugs pas ci

zhig bgyi/ /bdag cag rnams ni bu mo'i tshogs rnams sbron du mchi/ /nyi ma'i gung la sems can rnam par dag pa de/ /byis pa lnga brgya dag gis bskor nas lhan cig tu/ /yab la ma gsol yum la ma gsol ma tshor bar/ /

de ni byung nas zhing pa rnams kyi grong du song / /rgyal po dam pa'i zhing pa dag gi grong de na/ /'dzam bu'i sdong chen yal ga mang po rgyas yod pa/ /gzhon nus mthong na nyam thag sdug bsngal phog gyur te/ /'dus byas ci rung

sdug bsngal mang zhes snying rje byed/ /dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'dzam bu'i grib mar song / /rtswa dag bsdus te bdag gis gding ba bting nas ni/ /skyil mo krung 'dug drang por lus bsrang bsam gtan bzhi/ /dge ba

dag la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan byed/ /drang srong lnga zhig nam mkha'i dkyil nas dong dong na/ /'dzam bu'i shing gi steng du phyin nas 'dong ma nus/ /de dag thogs nas nga rgyal dregs pa spang bya zhing / /de dag thams
cad 'thun par lhan cig lta bar byed/ /bdag cag ri mchog ri rab de bzhin 'khor yug dag /thal phyung thags thogs med par shugs kyis dong dong na/ /bdag cag de ring 'dzam bu'i shing ljon 'di las ni/ /

'da' bar ma nus 'di la rgyu rkyen ci zhig yod/ /babs te sa stengs 'dug nas 'dzam bu'i shing drung na/ /shAkya'i bu pho byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid can/ /'dzam gling gser gyi 'od 'phro 'dra ba 'od zer ldan/ /skyil mo

krung bcas bsam gtan byed pa de tshe mthong / /de dag rmad gyur spyi bor sor bcu thal sbyar te/ /thal mo sbyar ba rkang par gtugs nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba shin du bde mdzad legs par bltam pa legs/ /myur du

rnam sangs rgyas te bdud rtsir sems can thul/ /sdong po mchog ni pad ma 'dra ba'i spyan la 'dud/ /gdugs yol gyur kyang grib mas bde bar gshegs mi gtong / /lha rnams stong phrag mang po gnas pa thal sbyar nas/ /

des par byas pa de yi rkang par phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zas gtsang rgyal po bdag gi khyim na yongs tshol zhing / /nga'i bu gzhon nu de ni gang du song zhes rmed/ /sru mos smras pa bdag gis btsal kyang ma rnyed na/ /gzhon nu de ni

gar bzhud rgyal pos rma bar gsol/ /zas gtsang rgyal pos nyung rum dag la rings par rmas/ /nga yi gzhon nu 'di nas byung bar la las mthong ngam zhes/ /sgo ba rnams dang de bzhin nang mi kun la'ang rmas/ /lha gcig

khyod gson mchog de zhing pa'i grong du bzhud/ /de ni rings par shAkya rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /byung nas dpal zhugs gyur pa'i zhing pa'i grong du bltas/ /ji ltar nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig shar ba ltar/ /de ltar dpal gyis

'bar zhing phan byed 'dug pa mthong / /cod pan ral gri lham dag pha zad phog phud de/ /mgo bor sor bcu thal mo sbyar nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /drang srong bdag nyid chen po legs par yang dag smra/ /gzhon nu byang chub don du

mngon par 'byung du nges/ /rab tu dad lha brgya phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dang / /de bzhin shAkya lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs pa dang / /bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul mthong / /bsam pa brtan pas rdzogs pa'i byang

chub sems kyang skyed/ /des ni stong gsum ma lus sa rnams rab bskyod nas/ /dran dang shes bzhin ting nge 'dzin las langs gyur te/ /mdog bzang ldan pas yab la tshangs pa'i tshig brjod pa/ /yab cig zhing blas thong la

gzhan las tshol ma mdzad/ /gal te gser zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis gser char dbab/ /de ste na bza' 'tshal na'ang bdag gis na bza' dbul/ /'on te 'bru zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis 'bru char dbab/ /mi dbang

khyod kyis 'gro ba kun la yang dag sbyor/ /yab dang de bzhin skye bo 'khor la bstan byas nas/ /skad cig de la de slar grong khyer mchog tu zhugs/ /'gro dang 'thun pa tsam du grong khyer der gnas kyi/ /sems can rnam
dag mngon par 'byung ba'i yid dang ldan/ /zhing ba'i grong gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bdun pa/ dge slong dag

de ltar gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes pa dang / dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang ma shAkya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'dun sa na 'dug 'dug pa de'i tshe/ shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs kha cig gis rgyal po zas

gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni bram ze ltas mkhan rnams dang / blo nges pa dang ldan pa'i lha mang pos 'di skad du bstan te/ gzhon nu 'di gal

te mngon par byung bar gyur na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /ji ste mngon par ma byung na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba chos

kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud

med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun no/ /de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba 'byung ngo / /de gnod par bya ba dang /

mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun pas sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di las mngon par rgyal bar byas te/ gcig pu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/ de'i slad du gzhon nu de'i btsun mo blang bar bgyi'o/ /de ltar mdzad dang bud med kyi

tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ dgyes pa la longs spyod cing mngon par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dang bdag cag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gdung yang mi 'chad/ khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang

mi snyan par mi brjod cing rim gror bgyi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ gal te de ltar bya na de'i phyir gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun pa'i bu mo gang zhig yod khyed kyis ltos shig /de'i tshe shAkya lnga

brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun no/ /bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun no zhes zer ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu de ni shin du phul che ba yin gyis/ gzhon

nu nyid la khyod bu mo gang 'dod ces dri bar bya'o zhes/ de dag kun kyang 'dus te/ gzhon nu la dngos po de brjod do/ /gzhon nus smras pa/ da ste dgung bdun na 'di'i lan gsan par gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di

snyam du bsams te/ 'dod pa'i skyon ni bdag gis mtha' yas rig /thab mo khon bcas mya ngan sdug bsngal rtsa/ /'jigs byed dug gi lo ma 'dra ba ste/ /me dang 'dra zhing ral gri'i so dang 'dra/ /'dod pa'i yon tan

bdag 'dod ma yin te/ /bdag ni bud med tshogs dang mdzes ma yin/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde bas zhi sems su/ /bdag ni mi smra nags tshal gnas par bya/ /yang des brtags nas thabs mkhas pa mngon du byas te/

sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la bltas nas/ snying rje chen po bskyed de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dam dang lcag lcig khrod nas pad ma rnam par 'phel/ /mi rnams gang ba'i nang na rgyal po mchod

pa 'thob/ /gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mchog thob gyur pa/ /de tshe sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med 'dul/ /sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang byung ba/ /de dag kun gyis btsun mo sras

dang slas kyang bstan/ /'on kyang 'dod pas chags med bsam gtan bde ma nyams/ /bdag kyang de dag yon tan rjes su bslab par bya/ /gang la spyod lam yon tan bden pa'i tshig med pa/ /bud med phal pa gang yang
bdag gi tshul 'thun min/ /gang zhig bdag gi sems ni mngon par dga' byed cing / /bag yod gzugs dang na tshod rus rigs dag pa 'os/ /des ni yon tan tshigs su bcad de yi ger bris/ /'di 'dra'i bu mo
mchis na bdag la bka' stsol cig /skye bo phal pa ma bsdams bdag la mkho ma lags/ /yon tan brjod pa 'di ldan mchis na bdag stsol cig /dar cing gzugs bzang ldan yang gzugs kyi dregs dang bral/ /

phu nu ma la byams ltar byams pa'i sems ldan zhing / /gtong la dga' ste dge sbyong bram ze sbyin tshul can/ /de 'dra'i bu mo mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig /gang la nga rgyal khengs dang zhe sdang ma mchis shing / /g.yo

dang phrag dog sgyu spangs drang ba'i ngang tshul can/ /rmi lam na yang skyes pa gzhan la chags dang bral/ /bdag gi khyos ni chog 'tshal rtag sdom bag mchis la/ /rgyags pa ma mchis mi g.yeng zung thub tshul 'chang zhing / /
nga rgyal ma mchis 'gying dang bral bas bran mo bzhin/ /sgra dri ro la ma chags chang la ma chags te/ /'dod bral brnab sems ma mchis rang gi nor gyis 'tshal/ /bden la gnas shing mi 'phyar g.yeng ba

ma lags pa/ /ngo tsha'i gos 'tshal rgod dang khengs pa ma mchis gnas/ /lha dang bkra shis ma chags rtag tu chos la brtson/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dngos po rab dag pa/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa mi mang nga rgyal glen

bral zhing / /rtog dang ldan la legs pa'i las rnams rtag spyod de/ /gyos sgyug gnyis la'ang ston pa bzhin gyi rim gror ldan/ /bran dang bran mo kun la'ang bdag bzhin byams srel ba/ /smad 'tshong bzhin du bstan
bcos cho ga 'tshal cing mkhas/ /slad kyis nyal zhing sngon du mal nas ldang bgyid pa/ /byams pas rjes snyegs ma bzhin tshul 'chos ma mchis pa/ /de 'dra'i bud med mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig /dge

slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas/ mdun na 'don la smras pa/ bram ze chen po khyod ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song la/ khyim thams cad du'ang song ste/

bu mo dag ltos la gang la yang rung ste yon tan de lta bu dag yod na/ rgyal rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / bram ze'i bu mo yang rung / rje'u rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / dmangs rigs kyi bu mo yang rung gis/ bu mo de dag 'dir

'on cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di ni rigs don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ gzhon nu 'di ni yon tan don du gnyer ba yin no/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /rgyal rigs bram ze'i bu mo
dang / /rje'u rigs dmangs rigs de bzhin te/ /su la yon tan 'di yod pa'i/ /bu mo de ni 'dir 'on cig /nga yi bu 'di rigs dag dang / /rus la ngo mtshar 'dzin ma yin/ /yon tan bden pa chos kyi rnams/ /

de la 'di yi yid dga' 'o/ /dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na 'don des tshigs su bcad pa yi ger bris pa de khyer te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song nas/ khyim nas khyim du yon tan de lta bu dang

ldan pa'i bu mo lta zhing tshol du song song ba las/ yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo ma mthong ste/ de nas rim gyis shAkya lag na be con can gyi khyim du phyin nas/ des bltas na/ bu mo gzugs mdzes shing blta

na sdug la yid du 'ong ba/ mdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi

gnag pa/ gzod ma dar la bab pa/ bud med rin po che ltar snang ba zhig mthong ba dang / bu mo des bram ze mdun na 'don de'i rkang pa gnyis nas bzung ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze chen po khyod la dgos pa ci
zhig mchis/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ zas gtsang sras po gzugs ni mchog tu mdzes gyur cing / /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan yon tan gzi brjid can/ /de yis bud med

rnams kyi yon tan yi ger bris/ /su la yon tan 'di yod de'i chung mar 'os/ /zhes smras te/ des de la yi ge de byin no/ /de nas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa'i yi ge de klags nas/ bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/ bram

ze mdun na 'don de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze yon tan 'di dag bdag la kun tshang gis/ /des pa'i gzugs can de ni bdag gi khyim thab bo/ /gal te gzhon nu bzhed na phyi bshol ma mdzad gsungs/ /

brgya la skye bo phal dang bzhugs par 'gyur yang gda'/ /de nas bram ze mdun na 'don de/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du song ste don de brjod pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag gis gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun pa'i bu mo

mthong ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ su la de lta bu zhig yod/ smras pa/ lha shAkya lag na be con can la bu mo de lta bu zhig mchis so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de ni shin du phul che zhing

bzang ba la mos pa yin la/ bud med dag ni phal cher yon tan med pa dag kyang / bdag la yon tan yod par khas len gyis/ bdag gis yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag cig byas te/ gzhon nu 'di bu mo thams cad la sbyin

pa byed du gzhug go/ /bu mo de dag gi nang nas gang la gzhon nu mig mngon par chags par gyur pa de/ gzhon nu la sbyin par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad gser dang / dngul dang /

rin po che sna tshogs las byed du bcug nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na kun gyis kyang gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur te/ yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag kyang bu mo dag la

sbyin pa byed kyis/ bu mo thams cad kyang 'dun khang du shog shig ces bsgo'o/ /dge slong dag de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dun khang du song ste/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/ /de'i tshe rgyal po zas

gtsang mas bya ra ba dag bkod nas/ gzhon nu 'di bu mo gang la mig chags pa de nga la gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /dge slong dag de nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de na bu mo gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag

thams cad 'dun khang ga la ba de dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad blangs pa'i phyir der dong ngo / /dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa'as

bu mo ji ltar 'ongs pa de dag la yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad rnams byin no/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag blangs shing myur ba myur bar

phyir dong ngo / /de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba/ bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'dun khang ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / mig mi

'dzums par byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag byin zin par gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas

'dzum dmul te byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu bdag gis khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na/ bdag la de ltar dngan sdang mdzad/ smras pa/ ngas ni khyod la dngan sdang byas pa'ang med

na/ khyod ni shin du 'phyis te 'ongs so zhes smras nas des sor gdub srang brgya stong du ma ri ba phud de de la byin no/ /bu mo des smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod la bdag gis 'di lta zhig 'tshal ba 'os sam/ smras pa/ 'o na rgyan

gzhan dang gzhan dag yod pa 'di dag kyang khyod khyer cig /des smras pa/ gzhon nu bdag ni rgyan ma mchis par bgyid pa ma lags kyi/ rgyan dang ldan par bgyid pa lags so/ /zhes smras nas bu mo de song ngo / /de nas bya

ra bar bkod pa'i mi de dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du song nas/ lo rgyus de dag smos te smras pa/ lha shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bgyi ba de la gzhon nu spyan chags par gyur la chung zad cig

tu bka' mchid kyang bgyis so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi gan du bram ze mdun na 'don pho nyar btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo zhig yod pa de nga'i gzhon nu la byin cig

ces spring ngo / /lag na be con can gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gzhon nu de ni pho brang na skyid de bar 'khrungs pa lags la/ bdag cag gi rigs kyi chos ni 'di lta bu lags te/ sgyu rtsal shes pa la bu mo gtong gi /

sgyu rtsal mi shes pa la mi gtong ba lags na/ gzhon nu de ni sgyu rtsal shes pa yang ma lags la/ ral gri'i thabs dang / 'phong dang / stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyi tshul shes pa yang ma lags na/

bdag gis sgyu rtsal shes pa ma lags pa la bu mo ji ltar gtang / tshig de rgyal po la bzlas pa dang / de nas rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ nga la des 'di dang lan gnyis su bsdos te/ gang gi tshe ngas shAkya gzhon nu dag /

gzhon nu'i rim gro byed du ci'i phyir mi 'ong zhes byas pa de'i tshe yang / ci nged lug gi rim gro byed du 'ong ngam zhes zer la/ da'ang 'di skad zer ro snyam du sems shing 'dug par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang

gtam de thos nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci nongs te de ltar zhal zung gnag par bzhugs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu de dri bas ci zhig bya/ gzhon nus

smras pa/ lha de ni bka' mi stsal du mi rung ngo zhes lan gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la dris pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la dngos po de dag brjod
do/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha grong khyer 'di na bdag dang sgyu rtsal gyis 'dran par nus pa 'ga' mchis sam/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bgad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /bu khyod kyis sgyu rtsal bstan par nus sam/ smras pa/ lha de ni bdag gis legs par rngo thog go/ /de bas na sgyu rtsal 'tshal ba rnams kun kyang bsog tu gsol/ de dag gi mdun du bdag gis/ sgyu rtsal bstan

par bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na gzhon nu rang gi sgyu rtsal ston gyis/ der sgyu rtsal shes pa thams cad shog shig ces bsgo'o/ /

de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam tshogs par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du bzhag ste/ 'dir ral gri'i thabs dang 'phong dang / stobs dang / gyad kyi

'dzin stangs kyis su rgyal ba de ni 'di khyer cig ces dam bcas nas/ de'i tshe thams cad kyi thog ma la gzhon nu lha sbyin grong khyer nas byung ngo / /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i bzhon par glang po dkar po bong shin du che ba zhig

grong khyer du khrid pa gzhon nu lha sbyin gyis mthong nas phrag dog dang / shAkya'i nga rgyal dang / stobs kyi nga rgyal gyis dregs nas/ des glang po de lag pa g.yon pas sna nas bzung ste/ lag pa g.yas pas thal mo lan cig bsnun pas

bsad par gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu gzhon nu mdzes dga' bo byung ba dang / des glang po chen po de grong khyer gyi sgor bsad pa mthong nas/ sus bsad ces dris pa dang / smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis bsad do/ /smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legs

pa zhig byas so zhes/ des glang po de'i mjug ma nas bzung ste/ grong khyer gyi sgo nas gud du bor ro/ /de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' shing rta la zhon te byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas glang po de ltar bsad pa mthong ngo / /

mthong nas kyang sus bsad ces dris pa dang / smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis bsad do/ /smras pa lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /grong khyer 'di'i sgo nas sus bor zhes dris pa dang / smras pa/ mdzes dga' bos bor ro/ /smras pa/

mdzes dga' bos de ltar byas pa yang legs na/ sems can 'di ni lus chen po dang ldan pa ste/ rul na grong khyer thams cad dri mi zhim pas gang bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta la 'dug bzhin

du rkang pa ya gcig sa la brkyang ste/ rkang pa'i mthe bos glang po de blangs te/ ra ba bdun rim dang 'obs bdun rim 'das nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol rgyang grags gcig tsam du 'phangs so/ /glang po de phyogs gang du lhung ba'i

phyogs de shong chen po zhig tu gyur nas/ da ltar glang po'i shong zhes bya ba yin no/ /de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong mang po e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin la/ gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin par

gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /glang po'i dbang po bdo ba bzhin bzhud pa/ /zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs/ /ra ba bdun dang 'obs bdun yongs bzlas nas/ /

grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/ /mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'dis ni gdon mi zar/ /nga rgyal stobs kyis mtho ba'i lus can rnams/ /'khor ba'i grong nas phyi rol rgyang ring du/ /shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni

'phen par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam grong khyer nas 'thon nas/ sa'i phyogs gang du shAkya gzhon nu dag sgyu rtsal ston pa der dong ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rgan rabs rgan

rabs dag dang / skye bo phal po che dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang / shAkya gzhon nu gzhan dag gi sgyu rtsal gyi khyad par mthong bar 'dod de sa'i phyogs der dong ngo / /de nas thog mar shAkya gzhon nu yi ge mkhas shing yi ge'i cho ga

shes pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpar yi ge 'gran to/ /de'i tshe shAkya de dag gis slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen dpang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas/ yi ge 'bru 'am/ yi ge'i sna grangs kyi mthar phyin

pas khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin khyod kyis bye brag phye shig /de nas slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' yi ge la mkhas pa mngon du mthong bas bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di

dag smras so/ /mi yi 'jig rten lha yi 'jig rten nam/ /lha min 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam/ /'jig rten kun gyi yi ge ji snyed gang / /de la sems can dag pa 'dis mthar phyin/ /mi yi zla ba 'di yis gang

mkhyen pa'i/ /yi ge dag dang yi ge'i sna grangs kyi/ /ming yang khyed dang ngas ni yong mi shes/ /'di la mngon sum ngas shes 'di rgyal 'gyur/ /shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di yi ge'i shes pa la khyad par du 'phags par chug

ste/ gzhon nu 'di grangs kyis shes pa la khyad par ci yod 'gran par bya'o/ /de nas shAkya srid sgrub ces bya ba rtsis pa chen po byed pa bgrang ba dang / rtsis kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig yod pa de dpang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang

nas grangs kyi shes pa la khyad par du gang 'phags khyod kyis ltos shig ces byas te/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas ni rtsis mgo phog /shAkya gzhon nu gcig gis ni brtsis pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la slebs par

ma nus so/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgya nas/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu brtsis kyang byang

chub sems dpa' la ma slebs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyed kyis ni rtsis mgo phog shig /kho bos ni brtsi'o/ /de'i tshe shAkya gzhon nu gcig gis rtsis mgo phog na/ byang chub sems dpas brtsis kyi

chod pa la ma slebs so/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgya nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus

gcig tu rtsis mgo phog kyang byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyis chod pa la ma slebs so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di la brtsad de yang ci rung gis/ khyed thams cad gcig tu 'dus te rtsis mgo phog shig dang /

kho bos brtsi'o/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas tshig gcig tu brjod pas snga phyi med par rtsis mgo phog na/ byang chub sems dpas rmongs pa med par brtsis te/ de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad ni phug thug

par gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ni thug pa'i mtha' med par gyur to/ /de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub ngo mtshar du gyur te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /legs pa'i blo mnga' 'di dris na/ /mkhyen

pa shin du myur ba ste/ /shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam/ /kun kyang rtsis kyi lam la thug /de yi shes rab 'di 'dra ste/ /ye shes blo gros dran ldan yang / /rtsis kyi mkhyen pa rgya mtsho de/ /da dung sbyong zhing slob pa mdzad/ /de nas

shAkya'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ shin du rmad du byung bar sems shing / de'i tshe thams cad mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye don grub gzhon nu khyod ni rgyal lo rgyal lo zhes thams cad stan

las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod la sras de ltar dris pa la spobs pa myur zhing mgyogs la/ yang zhing

shugs dang ldan pa can mnga' ba ni brnyes pa legs par brnyes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub grangs kyi shes pa la mkhas pa dang /

rtsis kyi lugs 'gran nus sam/ smras pa/ lha rngo thog go/ /smras pa 'o na rtsis shig /de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu khyod bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa

zhes bgyi ba'i rtsis kyi lugs mkhyen tam/ smras pa/ shes so/ /smras pa/ 'o na bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa'i rtsis kyi lugs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bye ba phrag brgya na ther

'bum zhes bya'o/ /ther 'bum phrag brgya na khrag khrig ces bya'o/ /khrag khrig phrag brgya na gtams pa zhes bya'o/ /gtams pa phrag brgya na dkrigs pa zhes bya'o/ /dkrigs pa phrag brgya na mi 'khrugs pa shes bya'o/ /

mi 'khrugs phrag brgya na khyad phyin ces bya'o/ /khyad phyin phrag brgya na phang steng zhes bya'o/ /phang steng phrag brgya na mang 'dzin ces bya'o/ /mang 'dzin phrag brgya na glang po'i stobs shes bya'o/ /glang po'i stobs phrag brgya na ngogs

'thob ces bya'o/ /ngogs 'thob phrag brgya na rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa phrag brgya na rgyu rig ces bya'o/ /rgyu rig phrag brgya na lag sbyin zhes bya'o/ /lag sbyin phrag brgya na

rgyu dbang zhes bya'o/ /rgyu dbang phrag brgya na rdzogs thob ces bya'o/ /rdzogs thob phrag brgya na bgrang rtogs shes bya'o/ /bgrang rtogs phrag brgya na sgrib pa zhes bya'o/ /sgrib pa phrag brgya na stobs shes bya'o/ /stobs phrag

brgya na kun stobs shes bya'o/ /kun stobs phrag brgya na rnam par brda shes ldan zhes bya'o/ /rnam par brda shes ldan phrag brgya na brda shes kun zhes bya'o/ /brda shes kun phrag brgya na rnam 'byung zhes bya'o/ /rnam 'byung phrag

brgya na de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/ 'di ltar de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i rtsis kyis ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo / /de yi yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/

grangs des ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo / /de'i yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nges par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /de'i yang gong na ded 'dren gdags pa zhes bya ba'i grangs

yod do/ /de'i yang gong na gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /de'i yang gong na gcod rtog shes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /de'i yang gong na gcod rtogs ldan zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /de'i yang gong

na thams cad rnam par 'byes pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs des ni gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo / /de'i yang gong na snying po mchog ces bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs

des ni gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo / /de'i yang gong na rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa

dang / byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba mngon du gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na grangs de shes pa ni nga dang

gzhan yang nga dang 'dra ba srid pa tha ma par gyur pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par ma byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs pa gang yang med do/ /srid sgrub kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su

song ba'i grangs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go/ /rdul phra mo bdun la ni rdul chung ngu gcig go/ /rdul chung ngu bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul

gcig go/ /nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong rdul gcig go/ /ri bong rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go/ /lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/ /glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go/ /sro ma bdun la ni yungs

'bru gcig go/ /yungs 'bru bdun la ni nas gcig go/ /nas bdun la ni sor gcig go/ /sor bcu gnyis la ni mtho gang ngo / /mtho do la ni khru gang ngo / /khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo / /gzhu stong la ni yul ma ga d+hA'i

rgyang grags gcig go/ /rgyang grags bzhi la ni dpag tshad gcig go/ /de la khyed kyis nang nas dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du yod sus shes/ srid sgrub kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu bdag nyid kyang de la mgo rmongs na

gzhan blo chung ngu dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de bas na gzhon nus dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du mchis bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de la dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab mi 'khrugs

khrag khrig gcig dang / bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum bcu dang / bye ba drug bcu phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / 'bum phrag lnga dang / khri nyis stong yod de/ dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab de snyed cig yod do/ /de ltar

'jug pa des 'dzam bu'i gling 'di la ni dpag tshad bdun stong yod do/ /nub kyi ba lang spyod la ni dpag tshad brgyad stong yod do/ /shar gyi lus 'phags la ni dpag tshad dgu stong yod do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la ni dpag tshad khri yod de/

de ltar 'jug pa des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /

ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'phrul dga' bye ba phrag brgya dang /

gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs ris bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs chen bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang /

tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang /

'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can 'du shes med pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang / shin du mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'og min gyi

lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig ces bya ste/ yangs shing rgya che ba de la dpag tshad du yod pa dang / dpag tshad brgya phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad stong phrag du yod pa dang /

dpag tshad bye ba phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad ther 'bum phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad khrag khrig phrag du yod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpag tshad snying po dam pa'i rtsis kyi bar du thug pa la rdul phra rab de lta bu

du yod ces bya ba'i rtsis de ni grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa ste/ de ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o/ /de bas kyang shin du grangs med pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod do/ /

byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyi le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub dang / shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas/ de dag thams cad kyang gos re re zhig

bzhag ste gos dang rgyan lhag ma gzhan byang chub sems dpa' la yon du phul lo/ /de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bye ba brgya na ther 'bum ther 'bum de bzhin du/ /khrag

khrig dang ni gtams pa'i rgyud dang de bzhin du/ /dkrigs pa mi 'khrugs bdag gi shes thug de gong min/ /mtshungs pa med kyi mkhyen pa rtsis la de bas lhag /yang kye shAkya dag /stong gsum dag gi rdul dang rtswa dang

nags tshal dang / /sman dang chu yi thigs pa ji snyed yod pa yang / /hu zhes bya ba gcig la 'di yis rtsi nus na/ /lnga brgya tsam dag gi lta ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ /de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag /e ma a la la zhes zer

zhing ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do/ /dus gsum sems can ma lus ji snyed gang yod pa'i/ /sems

dang sems byung 'du shes rnam par rtog pa dag /mchog dang tha ma de bzhin rgya chung yangs pa dag /thams cad sems kyi 'gyur ba gcig gis rab tu mkhyen/ /dge slong dag de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad

zil gyis non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/ /de'i rjes la mchongs pa dang / rkyal dang / bang la sogs pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' nyid khyad par du
'phags par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /brtul zhugs dka' thub sdom pa'i yon tan dang / /bskal pa bye bar bzod dul byams stobs kyis/ /lus

dang sems ni ci nas yang mdzad pas/ /de yi shugs kyi khyad par mnyan par gyis/ /sems can mchog 'di grong khyer 'di na bzhugs par khyed kyis mthong / /'on kyang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams

thams cad du/ /skad cig gcig la rin chen gser dang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rgyal ba dpag tu med pa dag la mchod pa mdzad du bzhud/ /'on kyang rdzu 'phrul de 'dra brnyes pa de/ /byon tam bzhud par khyed

kyis yong mi shes/ /ji tsam zhugs shes de la ci zhig bskyed/ /'di ni mtshungs pa med kyis rim gro skyed/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya de dag gis smras

pa/ gzhon nu 'di la stobs kyi khyad par ci yod pa'ang sad par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gcig tu so so nas stobs 'gyed par gyur te/

shAkya gzhon nu sum bcu rtsa gnyis shig 'tshogs nas byang chub sems dpa' la brgal ba ltar chas te 'khod do/ /de'i nang nas dga' bo dang / kun dga' bo gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal ba'i phyir

drung du phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lag gis reg ma thag tu de gnyis kas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang gzi brjid ma bzod de sa la sgyel to/ /de'i 'og tu shAkya gzhon nu lha sbyin nga rgyal can mthu

snyems pa de stobs kyi nga rgyal dang shAkya'i nga rgyal gyis snyems la/ byang chub sems dpa' la sdo zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i ltad mo pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskor te/ bsgyings nas byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal

to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas ma stabs shing mi rings par stangs bzang por gzhon nu lhas byin lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste bsad pa'i blos ma yin gyi nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyis nam mkha' las

bskor bskor te sa'i steng du bor yang de'i lus la gnod par gyur pa med do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de lta bu gnod par 'gyur bas chog gis thams cad gcig tu 'dus te brgal bar gyis shig /de nas de dag thams

cad nga rgyal gyis rlom zhing byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur to/ /de nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' la reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang lus kyi mthu ma bzod de/ byang chub sems

dpas reg pa tsam gyis sa la sgyel bar gyur to/ /de nas lha dang mi brgya stong de dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing / ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ngo / /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang me
tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag gyad chen stobs po che 'dra la/ /cig car skyes bu'i

mchog la rub gyur kyang / /reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /lhun po ri rab rdo rje'i 'khor yug dang / /phyogs bcu dag na ri gzhan gang yod pa/ /lag pas mnyes shing dmeg med phyer klog na/ /mi lus

snying po med pa mtshar ci che/ /'di ni shing dbang mchog drung sdang ba'i gyad/ /dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mtshan sder bcas pa/ /nag po'i rtsa lag byams pa'i stobs kyis 'joms/ /bla med byang chub zhi bar

'tshang yang rgya/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyis shAkya gzhon nu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di dag ni sad kyang zin/ mthong yang zin

gyis da ni 'phong zhig bstan par gyis shig /de'i tshe kun dga' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ /de'i 'og tu lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol du lcags kyi rnga gcig

'ben du btsugs so/ /de'i 'og tu mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ /de'i 'og tu shAkya lag na be con can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga

gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs te/ de'i drung du shing ta la bdun dngar nas de'i pha rol tu lcags kyi phag rgod kyi gzugs

'khrul 'khor du byas pa gcig btsugs so/ /de nas kun dga' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ de phan chod kyi la phog par ma nus so/ /lha sbyin gyis rgyang

grags bzhi'i pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so/ /mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/

de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so/ /lag na be con can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ thal byung du phyin nas de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so/ /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' la gzhu gang dang gang byin pa de dag la la ni gzhu rgyud chad/ la la ni chag nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grong khyer 'di na gzhu gzhan la la bdag gis brdung bzod pa 'am/ lus kyi stobs

dang mthu bzod pa mchis sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu yod do/ /gzhon nus smras pa/ lha de lta bu gang na mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod kyi mes seng ge'i za 'gram zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i snam ru da ltar lha

khang na spos dang phreng bas mchod de/ de ni sus kyang brdung bar yang mi nus na/ dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha de blang du gsol/ sad par bgyi'o/ /de nas gzhu de

blangs te 'ongs pa dang / shAkya gzhon nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi mchog gis bsgrims kyang gzhu de brdung bar yang ma nus na dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te ma nus so/ /de nas gzhu de shAkya lag na be con can gyis lus

kyi mthu stobs thams cad phyung ste/ gzhu de brdung bar brgal na ma brdungs so/ /de nas gzhu de byang chub sems dpa' la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas gzhu de blangs te stan las ma langs par skyil mo dkrung phyed

bcas te/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gcig gis brdungs so/ /gzhu de de ltar brdungs pa'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad du sgra mngon par grag par gyur to/ /grong

khyer gyi mi thams cad kyang sreg sreg por gyur te/ gcig la gcig 'dri zhing 'di ltar ci'i sgra zhig ces zer ro/ /de la la la na re gzhon nu don grub kyis mes kyi snam ru brdungs nas de'i sgra byung ba 'di yin no zhes zer ro/ /

de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal

po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gdan las ma bzhengs brtsal ba ma mchis su/ /thub pas snam ru 'di 'dra brdungs pa las/ /gdon mi 'tshal bar dgongs pa rdzogs gyur te/ /bdud kyi sde bcom myur du

thub par byon/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas mda' blangs nas gzhu de dang sbyar te bkang nas 'phangs pa'i mthu stobs kyis kun dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lha sbyin gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa

dang / mdzes dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lag na be con can gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa de dag thams cad las thal nas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu bdag gi 'ben lcags kyi rnga btsugs pa dang / shing ta la bdun

dngar ba dang / phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa las kyang thal te mda' de sa la zug nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nub pa'i sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas da ltar

yang mda'i khron pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong dag /e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/ /shAkya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob ste/

kye ngo mtshar to/ /'dis ni bslabs kyang ma bslabs par rtsal gyi shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes zer ro/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po

che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sa'i snying po sngon gyi sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/ /zhi gnas snam ru thogs shing stong pa bdag med mda' rnams kyis/ /nyon mongs dgra

rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra ba dral nas su/ /byang chub dam pa zhi ba rdul med mya ngan med pa 'thob/ /de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te dong ngo / /de bzhin

du mchongs pa dang / yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / bang dang / tshar dang / rkyal dang / 'phong dpyad dang / glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta rtsal dang / shing rta'i

thabs dang / mda' gzhu'i thabs dang / brtan pa dang / mthu dang / dpa' ba dang / 'gyed stobs dang / lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / bzur ba dang / 'dzin

stangs dang / gom stabs dang / thor tshugs dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / dbug pa dang / gzhig pa dang / gsheg pa dang / mi 'chor bar 'phog pa dang / gnad du 'phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dang / cho lo'i rtsed mo dang / snyan

dngags sbyar ba dang / lam dang / ri mo dang / gzugs dang / gzugs kyi las dang / thabs kyi dpyad dang / me'i las dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / gar dang / glu dang / yi ge klag pa'i mig 'or dang / gtam dang / bzhad gad dang / rtsed

mo dang / bro dang / sgeg pa dang / phreng ba dang / brgyu ba dang / rlung yab g.yab pa dang / nor bu tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang / gos tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang / mig 'phrul gyi cho ga dang / rmi lam gyi dpyad dang / bya'i skad dang / bud med kyi mtshan dang /

skyes pa'i mtshan dang / glang po che'i mtshan dang / rta'i mtshan dang / ba lang gi mtshan dang / ra'i mtshan dang / lug gi mtshan dang / khyi'i mtshan dang / shes gsal dang / sgra nges par sbyor ba dang / nga ro sgyur ba dang / sngon gyi rabs dang / sngon

byung ba dang / rig byed dang / lung bstan pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge lci yang dang / tshig bsdeb pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang / skar ma'i lugs dang / grangs can gyi lugs dang / rnal 'byor gyi lugs dang / las kyi tshogs dang /

bye brag pa'i lugs dang / nor gyi rig pa dang / phur bu'i lugs dang / chu'i lugs dang / lha ma yin gyi lugs dang / bya dang ri dgas kyi skad dang / gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang / rgya skyegs kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / spra tshil gyi las dang /

'drub shur dang / brko bzhog dang / lo ma dra ba dang / spos sbyar ba la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal 'jig rten pa dang lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/ /

de'i tshe shAkya lag na be con can gyis rang gi bu mo sa 'tsho ma/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / de rim gyis bag mar blangs te byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo/ /de na byang chub sems dpas

'jig rten dang 'thun pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang du 'dug ste/ dga' zhing rtse la yongs su spyod pa ston to/ /bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nang na/ shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma btsun mo'i

mchog tu dbang bskur bar gyur to/ /de na shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma gyo sgyug gam nang mi gang mthong yang rung ste/ gdong mi sbed do/ /de dag kyang de la bag sar mo ni zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/ 'di ni rtag tu ma g.yogs so zhes

'phya smod cing mi snyan par zer ro/ /de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho mas gtam de thos nas nang mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dug dang 'greng dang 'chag pa la/ /'phags pa dag ni ma g.yogs

mdzes/ /nor bu rin chen 'od gsal ba/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mor gsal na mdzes/ /'phags pa 'gro na'ang mdzes pa ste/ /'ong na'ang de bzhin mdzes pa yin/ /'greng ba 'am de bzhin 'dug pa dang / /thams cad du'ang

'phags pa mdzes/ /'phags pa smra na'ang mdzes pa ste/ /mi smrar 'dug kyang de bzhin mdzes/ /dper na ka la ping ka ni/ /mthong dang sgra thos de bzhin no/ /ku sha'i gos ni gyon pa dang / /gos ngan gyon dang lus rid pa/ /

de ni rang gi gzi yis mdzes/ /yon tan ldan pa yon tan brgyan/ /gang la sdig pa med gyur pa/ /'phags pa kun du dge ba yin/ /byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni/ /ji snyed brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin/ /gang dag snying la

sdig pa yod cing tshig 'jam pa/ /de dag dug gi bum par bdud rtsi blugs pa bzhin/ /brag gi ser ga rtsub pa lta bur nang yang rtsub/ /de 'dra de dag sbrul gyi kha la nyug pa bzhin/ /des pa de dag gan du kun 'ong kun phyag 'tshal/ /

'bab stegs thams cad lta bur 'gro ba kun gyi gsos/ /'phags pa dag ni rtag tu 'o zhos bkang bum 'dra/ /bdag nyid dag pa de 'dra mthong na bkra shis dge/ /gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po yun ring yongs spong zhing / /dge

ba'i bshes gnyen rin po ches ni yongs bzung la/ /sdig pa rnam spong sangs rgyas chos la mngon chags pa/ /de lta bu dag mthong ba bkra shis 'bras bu yod/ /gang dag lus bsdams lus kyi skyon rnams rab bsdams dang / /

gang dag tshig bsdams rtag tu tshig 'chal med gyur la/ /dbang po sbas shing shin du bsdams la yid dang ba/ /de lta bu dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya/ /gal te lus la gos ni stong gis g.yogs gyur kyang / /gang dag

sems bshus ngo tsha med cing khrel med dang / /gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med/ /de dag sgren mo bas kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu/ /gang zhig sems sbas rtag tu dbang po bsdams gyur cing / /bdag gis

khyos chog sems can gzhan la mi sems pa/ /de 'dra ba dag nyi zla bzhin du ma g.yogs snang / /de 'dra ba dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya/ /gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid che dang gzhan sems blo mkhas dang / /de

bzhin lha tshogs dag gis kho mo'i bsam pa dang / /kho mo'i tshul khrims yon tan sdom dang bag yod mkhyen/ /de lta bas na kho mos gdong bkab ci zhig dgos/ /dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i bu

mo sa 'tsho ma'i spobs pa dang bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thos so/ /thos nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ ras bcos su bzang po

rin po che du mas spras pa zung gcig dang / mu tig gi do shal srang bye ba brgya stong ri ba dang / mu tig dmar po bzang pos spras pa'i gser gyi phreng bas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma la bkab nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du

brjod do/ /kho bo'i bu ni yon tan ci 'dras brgyan pa dang / /mna' ma rang gi yon tan ji ltar rab smra ba/ /sems can dag pa de gnyis phrad par gyur pa ni/ /mar dang mar gyi nying ku ji ltar 'dra ba bzhin/ /sgyu rtsal bstan pa'i
le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub

sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa na/ gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las byed pa la spro bar gyur pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba du ma de dag rang rang gi dga' ba'i sgra 'byin cing lhags par gyur to/ /de la dge slong dag dus gzhan zhig na lha dang / klu dang / gnod

sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ ma la skyes bu dam pa

'di btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ha cang yun ring du thogs par gyur na sems can gang dag 'dis yun ring po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pas yongs su

smin par byas pa dang / gang dag 'dis byang chub thob nas/ chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag med par gyur nas/ phyis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ste/ bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'am cig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo/ /de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal

nas/ nam zhig na bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' dam pa mchog rab dag pa 'di mngon par byung ba dang / mngon par byung nas kyang shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa

btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang ldan pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa skor zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i

'jig rten mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa'i bsam pa de lta bus sdod cing 'khod par gyur to/ /dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med

pa'i yang grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ yun ring por rtag par rgyun du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par gyur cing / dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad la bdag

nyid slob dpon du gyur pa yin la/ yun ring po nas dus shes pa dang / tshod shes pa dang / ran pa shes par gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang dbang po la mkhas pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa dang / dus la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar dus ran pa las mi yol bar gyur pa'o/ /de mngon par shes
pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas 'di ni rab tu gzung ba'i dus so/ /'di ni tshar gcad pa'i dus so/ /'di ni bsdu ba'i dus so/ /'di ni phan gdags pa'i dus so/ /'di ni

btang snyoms su gzhag pa'i dus so/ /'di ni smra ba'i dus so/ /'di ni mi smra bar bya ba'i dus so/ /'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so/ /'di ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dus so/ /'di ni kha ton bya ba'i dus so/ /'di ni tshul bzhin

yid la bya ba'i dus so/ /'di ni rab tu dben par bya ba'i dus so/ /'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi bar gyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so/ /'di ni

lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge

bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so/ /'di ni chos bstan pa'i dus so/ /'di ni nang du yang dag gzhag pa'i dus so zhes bya ba thams cad bdag nyid kyis shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dus thams

cad du rtag par 'du shes par gyur cing / dus la lta ba yin yang dge slong dag 'di ni chos nyid kyis thob pa yin te/ srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten

gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams glu dbyangs dang sil snyan gyi sgra las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis yang dag par bskul ba mdzad do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can
mchog gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs/ /de dag mthu yis sil snyan sgra dag las/ /tshigs bcad sgra snyan 'di dag byung ba yis/ /mi mchog dam pa rnams la yang dag skul/ /sdug bsngal brgyas gang sems

can mthong nas ni/ /'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs dang gnas 'gyur zhing / /phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces/ /khyod kyis sngon ni smon lam de skad btab/ /dge ba dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang / /'gro phan

bya zhes smon btab dran par byos/ /'di ni khyod kyis dus man tshod yin gyis/ /drang srong mchog rab mngon par 'byung bar byos/ /sangs rgyas lha mi 'dul byed 'jig rten mchog /yon tan brgyas gang bar ni

gyur cig ces/ /de'i phyir khyod sngon mgo dang rkang lag dang / /nor gyi dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang / /khyod ni khrims kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad/ /khyod ni bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed/ /khyod ni brtson pas yon

tan brgya yis gang / /bsam gtan shes rab srid gsum mnyam pa med/ /khro bas non cing tha ba'i dri mang ba/ /de dag bde gshegs khyod kyi byams pas khyab/ /dge ba'i yon tan bral ba log nges pa/ /mi mkhas rnam mang

dag la khyod snying rje/ /bsod nams ye shes dge ba'i lus khyab cing / /rdul bral bsam gtan mngon shes lam mer 'dug /phyogs bcu 'di dag rnams su rab tu gsal/ /sprin med zla ba dri ma med pa 'dra/ /'di dang gzhan

yang snyan pa rnam mang gis/ /sil snyan dag las rgyal bas sgra bsgrags te/ /mngon par khyod 'byung dus ni 'di yin zhes/ /lha mis mchod par 'os la skul ma 'debs/ /dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khyim dam pa

mchog yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bde bar gnas pa dang 'thun pa/ lha'i khang khyim lta bu stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang

pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs mchog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dbye ba shin du rnam par phye ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du mas legs par brgyan

pa/ dar gyi lda ldi brgya stong du mas mngon par spyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu spyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi spang leb can gyi zam pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba

dang chun po mang po spyangs pa/ pog snod nas spos kyis bdugs pa/ dar la'i bla re bres pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog dri mchog tu zhim zhing / shin du mdzes pa dag bkram pa/ rdzing me tog pad ma dkar po dang / pad ma dang ldan pa'i

chu'i gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba mang ba/ bya 'dab skyob dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur pa dang / ku na la dang / ka la ping ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya rnam pa tha dad

pa'i tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ bai dUr+ya sngon po'i sa gzhi gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba/ gzugs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun du ston pa/ blta bas mi ngoms par nyams dga' ba/ dga' ba dang mchog tu

dga' ba dam pa skyed pa'i khyim dam pa mchog de na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khang pa mdzes pa chen po mchog na gnas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba/ yan lag dri ma med pa/ phreng ba dang rgyan ma bor ba/

dri mchog tu zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas lus bskus pa/ dkar zhing bzang la dri ma med cing rnam par dag la dri ma dang bral ba'i gos gyon pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ mal cha lha'i ras bcos bu bzang po phra ba du ma bting ba

'jam pa ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ yan lag dam pas spras pa'i mal bzang po'i steng na 'dug pa btsun mo'i 'khor dam pa/ lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/ lta ba dang 'thun pa/

spyod pa bzang pos mdzes par byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / pi bang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / kim pa la dang / na ku la

dang / sgra snyan dang / gling bu' snyan pa'i sgra 'byung ba'i sgra dbyangs dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs dang ldan pas bslang ba la/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis kyang / sgra mnyen zhing 'jam pa snyan la yid du
'ong ba dang / gling bu 'bud pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slong ngo / /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis sil snyan sgra byung ba'i sgra

skad de dag las byang chub sems dpa' la skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /bud med gang dag rab tu yid dga' sems dang bas/ /sil snyan yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin tshe/ /phyogs bcu'i

rgyal ba dam pa dag gi mthu yis ni/ /tshigs bcad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung / /rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'di mthong nas/ /go 'phang mya ngan med mchog rdul med sangs rgyas te/ /skye dang

rga dang sdug bsngal dag las dgrol lo zhes/ /dpa' bo khyod sngon smon lam de skad btab par gyur/ /de phyir dge myur grong khyer mchog 'di nas/ /byung la sngon gyi drang srong zhabs bcags pa/ /sa phyogs de ni rab

tu mnan nas su/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes mtshungs med 'tshang rgyar gyis/ /khyod kyis sngon chad sna tshogs rin chen nor/ /rkang lag phangs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur/ /drang srong chen po di ring khyod dus 'di/ /

chos kyi chu bo mtha' yas 'gro la phye/ /khyod kyi tshul khrims ma nyams dri med dge/ /sngon chad khyod ni rtag tu mchog gis brgyan/ /drang srong chen po khyod khrims 'dra ba med/ /'gro ba nyon mongs rnam pa mang
las khrol/ /khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni bzod pa spyad/ /khyod ni 'gro bas ngan brjod rnam mang bzod/ /bzod pas bzod cing dul bas des pa'i bdag /rkang gnyis dbang po mngon par 'byung blo gyis/ /khyod
brtson brtan zhing mi g.yo g.yo ba med/ /bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya chen gyur/ /g.yon can bdud ni sde dang bcas btul te/ /ngan song gsum po mtha' dag skams par gyis/ /gang phyir khyod kyis
brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad/ /dus ngan nyon mongs snyigs ma bsregs gyis la/ /khyod kyis bdud rtsi chu bo'i char phob ste/ /mgon med ring nas skom pa tshim par gyis/ /'chi med mya ngan med gnas sangs

rgyas te/ /skom pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhes/ /khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mchog dran byos te/ /grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung / /khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa mkhas/ khyod kyi
