phud 'phyang zhing lhags/ /kha cig stong pa mtshan med smon med mchog brjod cing / /sa las seng ge lta bur shin tu sgrogs shing lhags/ /kha cig sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes mthor zhing / /khyu mchog ci 'dra

de 'drar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags/ /kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing / /rma bya lta bur mkha' las shin tu sgrogs shing lhags/ /kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing / /zla ba lta bur

mkha' las shin tu rgyas shing lhags/ /kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de/ /bdud kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lhags/ /bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i/ /

dri med tog thogs byang chub snying po der yang lhags/ /kha cig mkha' las nor bu rin chen dra ba 'thor/ /zla ba zla bzangs thang skyes rnam mdzes man dA ra/ /par sha tsam pa ka dang sna ma'i me tog phreng / /byang chub sems

dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la 'thor/ /kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la/ /sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags/ /kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs byed la/ /bar snang gnas te

me tog skon bu 'thor zhing lhags/ /kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo la thogs nas ni/ /sa la spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lhags/ /kha cig rin chen mchod sdong sna tshogs thogs nas ni/ /rgyang ring 'dug

ste byang chub sems dpa' ston cing lhags/ /kha cig tshangs pa lta bur zhi ba'i gzugs bsgyur te/ /yid zhi rab zhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa/ /de dag ba spu dag las byams dang snying rje dang / /dga' dang

btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byung lhags/ /kha cig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi/ /lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar nas lhags gyur cing / /de dag byang chub shing drung phyin nas thal sbyar te/ /brgya byin

thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor/ /kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi skyong ba ji lta bar/ /dri za srin po mi 'am ci yis yongs bskor te/ /glog ltar gsal ba'i me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags/ /dri za mi 'am
ci yi skad kyis brtan pa bstod/ /kha cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras bur bcas/ /me tog bcas shing mchog gi dri ni rab 'byin la/ /lo mar sangs rgyas sras po lus phyed gnas thogs lhags/ /btud

nas sa yi snying por me tog rnams kyang 'thor/ /kha cig pad ma ud pal pad ma dkar po rgyas/ /pad ma'i snying por sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas/ /de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu thogs te lhags/ /
chags med yid ldan byang chub sems dpa' mkhas la bstod/ /kha cig lhun po lta bur lus chen bsgyur te lhags/ /bar snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'dor/ /bor ma thag tu me tog phreng ba rnams

su gyur/ /stong gsum dag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed/ /kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu dang / /de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig par ston cing lhags/ /de dag lus las chos kyi sgo mo mang

grag ste/ /de dag thos pas sems can khrag khrig sred pa spong / /kha cig mchu ni bim pa 'dra la bzhin mdzes shing / /kha bzhin rdzogs la mi 'am ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags/ /do shal sna tshogs legs brgyan

bu mo chas pa 'dra/ /de la lta bas lha yi tshogs rnams ngoms mi 'gyur/ /kha cig rdo rje lta bur mi phyed lus can de/ /rkang pas 'og gi chu yi phung po 'bog cing lhags/ /nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin

rgyas snang byed la/ /'od byed nyon mongs skyon rnams bcom pa kha cig lhags/ /kha cig rin po ches brgyan lag na rin chen thogs/ /zhing mang bye ba stong dag khebs par byed cing lhags/ /sems can mang la

phan dang bde dang tshim bya'i phyir/ /rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs/ /kha cig gzungs chen rin po che yi mdzod gyur cing / /ba spu rnams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rab brjod la/ /spobs par ldan

zhing blo gros ldan la blo mchog ldan/ /rgyags zhing rab dregs skye bo rtogs par byed cing lhags/ /kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga ltar thogs nas ni/ /rab tu rdung zhing mkha' las yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags/ /de yi sgra ni

phyogs bcur bye ba'i zhing song ste/ /bdud rtsi ma thob ston pa do mod 'tshang rgyar sgrog /byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'

la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po der kun tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag

de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po dbang phyug dbang bsgyur ba bdud sdig can de la bdag gis ma sbran par bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gi mi chas/ bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul bar bya'o/ /de las rnam par rgyal na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro/ /

'on tang bdud kyi 'khor na bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis nga'i seng ge rnam par rol pa mthong na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /

dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar bsams nas de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig phyung ste/ 'od zer des

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas mog mog por byas te rab tu g.yos par byas par yang gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par gyur to/ /bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di yang thos so/ /sems can shin tu dag pa bskal mang spyod spyad pa/ /zas gtsang

sras pos rgyal srid dag ni rab spangs te/ /phan byed de ni bdud rtsi mngon par 'dod pas byung / /byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis de ring bsgrim pa gyis/ /de ni bdag kyang rgal la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed/ /de ni bdag nyid

grol bas gzhan yang grol bar byed/ /de ni bdag kyang dbugs phyin gzhan dag dbugs kyang 'byin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan zlo/ /ngan song gsum po ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur/ /

lha mi rnams kyi grong khyer gang bar byed par 'gyur/ /phan pa byed pa de ni bdud rtsi thob gyur nas/ /bsam gtan mngon shes bdud rtsi bde mchog sbyin par 'gyur/ /gang tshe rang byung nyid kyis chos char mngon phab tshe/ /
nag po'i rtsa lag khyod kyi grong khyer stongs byed 'gyur/ /stobs med pas kyang stobs med 'gyur te dpung nyams 'gyur/ /phyogs ni phyogs min ci bya gar 'gro shes mi 'gyur/ /dge slong dag de ltar bdud

sdig can bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul nas rmi lam rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis rmis so/ /rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi gnas mun pas khyab par rmis pa dang /

rang gi gnas rdul gyis gang zhing gyo mo dang gseg mas gang bar rmis pa dang / bdag nyid sngangs skrag nas phyogs phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang / bdag cod pan dang bral zhing rna cha lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdag

mchu dang gre ba dang / rkan skams par rmis pa dang / bdag snying kun tu gdungs par rmis pa dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams rnyis par rmis pa dang / rdzing rnams skams te

chu med par rmis pa dang / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ka la ping ka dang / ku na la dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya'i tshogs rnams 'dab gshog zegs par rmis pa dang / rnga dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang /

khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / pi bang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / pheg dang / khar ba'i sil khrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad rnams chag grugs te sa la lhung bar rmis pa dang / 'khor sdug pas kyang

bdud spangs te ngo 'dzum gnag cing phyogs gcig tu dong nas sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang / chung ma'i dam pa phreng ba can yang mal nas sa la lhung ste lag pa gnyis mgo la rdeb par rmis pa dang / bdud kyi bu gang dag

shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / shin tu shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la

'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi bu mo rnams kyang kyi hud yab/ kyi hud yab ces chod nge 'don par rmis pa dang / bdag lus la gos dri ma can gyon par rmis pa dang / bdag mgo rdul gyis

gang la skya bo bseng bseng po dang / nyams chung ba dang / mdangs nyams par rmis pa dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdib par

rmis pa dang / de'i sde dpon gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang oms tshugs bcas te ngu zhing cho nges btab nas byer bar rmis pa dang / 'dod pa

na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang /

rab 'phrul dang / dbang bsgyur la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bdud la mi gus shing byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang / thab mo'i nang na de'i ral gri shugs nas ma phyin cing bdag mi

shis pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis pa dang / rang gi 'khor gyis bdag bor bar rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang / bram ze mis byin gyi bu yang bkra mi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang /
sgo ba kun tu dga' byed kyang kun tu mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang / nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang / 'dod pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dpal yang ngu bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi

dbang yang dbang med par gyur par rmis pa dang / rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs ma yin par rmis pa dang / nor bu dang mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang chad cing rnam par chad nas 'brul bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi
gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par rmis pa dang / shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam yang lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi sde bkod pa thams cad kyang khas sbub tu 'gyel bar rmis pa ste/

dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so/ /de sad pa dang / 'jigs skrag sngangs nas nang mi thams cad bsogs te/ dpung dang bcas pa dang / 'khor

dang sde dpon dang / sgo ba dang de dag 'dus par rig nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bdud des rmi/ lam de dag mthong nas nyam thag ste/ /sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram zhes bya dang / /bu rnams

dag dang 'khor rnams gang dag yin la smras/ /nag po'i rtsa lag de dag kun la yongs su dris/ /shAkya'i nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras/ /lo drug bar du bya dka' brtul zhugs drag po spyad/ /
byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis rab tu sgrims shig ces/ /mdang sum bar snang las ni tshigs bcad de skad grag /byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig

mang po rnams rtogs byed/ /gang tshe bdud rtsi thob ste bsil ba'i dngos reg tshe/ /des ni nga gnas ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur/ /dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni rab dong la/ /shing dbang drung 'dug
dge sbyong gcig de gzhom par bya/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams myur du rab tu sgrims/ /gal te nga la sdug sems phyi shol ma byed cig /dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang / /
mya ngan 'da' bas bdag dpung nyam chung yong mi 'gyur/ /de yang gcig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni/ /bgrang las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhar mi 'chad/ /dge slong dag de nas bdud kyi bu ded

dpon zhes bya bas bdud sdig can de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab cig ci nongs zhal gyur cing ni zhal mdog nyams/ /thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan lag nying lag 'dar/ /khyod kyis ci gsan ci gzigs myur du
bka' stsol cig /yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyar ba 'tshal bar bgyi/ /nga rgyal med bdud smras pa bu cig nga las nyon/ /ngas ni sdig pa'i rmi lam shin tu mi bzad rmis/ /de ring 'khor 'dir de kun ma
lus smras na ni/ /khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu sgyel bar 'gyur/ /ded dpon gyis smras pa/ gal te 'thab dus bab ste rgyal na nongs ma mchis/ /gal te der ni bcom par gyur na nongs dang bcas/ /
gal te khyod kyi rmi lam de 'dra'i ltas lags na/ /bzhag na dge ste g.yul ngor yongs su bstangs mi 'gyur/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ brtsal ba grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul ngor grags par 'gyur/ /gal te
brtan la brten te legs byas bdag cag rgyal/ /kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su/ /kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag mi 'tshal des mi nus/ /ded dpon gyis smras pa/ rgya chen dpung bdog
kyang ni shin tu mthu chung ste/ /stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis na g.yul las rgyal/ /gal te srin bu me khyer stong gsum gang gyur kyang / /nyi ma gcig pu'i zil du brlag ste 'od mi bgyid/ /gzhan

yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod ma mchis/ /mkhas dang mi mthun bgyid pa de ni gso mi nus/ /dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyis ded dpon gyi tshig ma mnyan nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung chen

po stobs che ba/ 'thab mo la dpa' ba/ 'jigs su rung ba/ spu zing zhes byed nus pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ma thos pa/ bzhin bsgyur ba rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur

ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ rkang lag sbrul brgya stong gis dkris pa dang ldan pa/ ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / sta re dang / rtse gsum kha gdeng dang / bong ba dang /

gtun shing dang / be con dang / zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa thogs pa/ lus la go cha bzang po bgos pa/ mgo dang / rkang lag dang / mig log par 'dug
pa/ mgo dang / mig dang / gdong 'bar ba/ lto dang rkang lag dbyibs mi sdug pa/ bzhin gzi brjid drag po dang ldan pa/ shin tu bzhin bsgyur cing so gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung bar mche ba gtsigs pa/

lce stug cing zheng che ba mang po 'phyang ba/ lce 'bar 'bur can re lde dang 'dra ba/ mig me dang sbrul nag po dug gis rgyas pa'i mig ltar dmar ba dag khar bcug ste/ de la kha cig ni sbrul gdug skyug pa/ kha cig ni

nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho nas phyung ba bzhin du lag mthil du sbrul gdug pa bzhag ste za/ kha cig ni mi'i sha dang / khrag dang / rkang lag dang / mgo dang / mkhal ma dang / nang grol dang / ngan skyugs la
sogs pa za/ kha cig ni gzugs sngo bsangs dang / kham pa po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser por 'dug ste/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs can/ kha cig ni mig zhigs pa dang / mig

khron pa lta bu dang / mig phyung ba lta bu dang / mig 'bar ba dang / mig bzur ba/ mi sdug pa/ kha cig ni mig log pa dang / 'bar ba dang / mi sdug pa/ kha cig ni ri 'bar ba thogs te/ 'gying zhing ri gzhan

la zhon te 'ong / kha cig ni shing rtsa thon byas te byang chub sems dpa' logs su rgyug cing 'ong / kha cig gi rna ba ni phag rna lta bu dang / zhib ma lta bu dang / glang po'i rna ba lta bu dang / 'phyang ba dang / phag rna lta bur

'dug pa/ kha cig ni rna ba med pa/ kha cig ni keng rus mang po sprul nas lus rid cing gsus pa che la sna zhom pa/ gsus pa bum pa lta bur 'dug pa/ rkang pa mgo'i thod pa ltar 'dug pa/ lpags pa dang / sha dang

khrag skams pa/ rna ba dang / sna dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / mgo bcad pa/ kha cig ni khrag 'thung 'dod pas gcig la gcig mgo gcod pa/ kha cig ni sgra sha sha po dang / sgra mi snyan pa dang / 'jigs

su rung ba dang / sgra rtsub pa ldan pa/ hu hu zhes bya ba dang / mchi zhes bya ba dang / hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pa dang / spyugs pa len pa dang / dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di shing dang chos te 'on cig ces zer ba dang /
'or cig ces zer ba dang / rgyob cig ces zer ba dang / rab tu rgyob cig ces zer ba dang / chings shig ces zer ba dang / zung shig ces zer ba dang / chod cig ces zer ba dang / gtubs shig ces zer

ba dang / gtogs shig ces zer ba dang / bab bab tu 'or cig ces zer ba dag go/ /kha cig ni wa dang / ce spyang dang / phag dang / bong bu dang / ba lang dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang /

rkyang dang / ma he dang / ri bong dang / g.yag dang / bse dang / ri dgas ldang sgo ska la sogs pa'i kha gdong sna tshogs 'jigs su rung ba sngangs par byed pa/ mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go/ /kha cig ni seng ge dang /

stag dang / phag rgod dang / dred dang / spre'u dang / gzig dang / byi la dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / ne'u le dang / nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / rus sbal dang / bya rog dang /

bya rgod dang / 'ug pa dang / nam mkha' lding lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa dag go/ /kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug pa dag go/ /kha cig ni mgo gcig pa dang / mgo gnyis pa nas mgo brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag

go/ /kha cig ni mgo med pa'o/ /kha cig ni lag pa gcig pa nas lag pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go/ /kha cig ni lag pa med pa dag go/ /kha cig ni rkang pa gcig pa nas rkang pa brgya stong gi bar

dang ldan pa dag go/ /kha cig ni rkang pa med pa dag go/ /kha cig ni rna ba dang / kha dang / sna dang / mig dang / lte ba'i khung bu nas sbrul gdug pa 'byin to/ /kha cig ni ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang /

rtse gsum kha gdeng dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / rdo rje dang / bong dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs gsor zhing gar byed la/ byang chub

sems dpa' la sdigs mo byed do/ /kha cig ni mi'i sor mo bcad nas phreng bar brgyus te thogs so/ /kha cig ni keng rus dang / thod pa dang / phreng ba lta bur brgyus te thogs so/ /kha cig ni lus sbrul gdug

pas dkris so/ /kha cig ni mgo la zhugs ling me can thogs te/ glang po dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he la zhon no/ /kha cig ni spyi'u tshugs su 'dug la khab lta bu'i spu can

dag go/ /kha cig ni ba lang dang / bong bu dang / phag rgod dang / ne'u le dang / ra dang / lug dang / byi la dang / spre'u dang / spyang ki dang / ce spyang gi spu lta bu dang ldan la/ sbrul gdug pa skyug cing lcags

kyi thu lum mid pa dang / me 'byin pa dang / lcags dang / zangs 'bar ba'i char 'bebs pa dang / lce 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang / lcags kyi bye ma tshan mo'i char 'bebs pa dang / sprin nag po

bsdus te rlung gi char 'bebs pa dang / mda'i sprin bsdus te char du 'bebs pa dang / mun gnag ston pa dang / sgra 'byin cing byang chub sems dpa'i logs su rgyug pa dag go/ /kha cig ni zhags pa bskor ba

dang / ri chen po rnyil bar byed pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs par byed pa dang / ri chen po las mchong ba dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun po sgul ba dang / rgyug pa dang / 'bros pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag 'thor

ba dang / lus skor ba dang / gad mo cher rgod pa dang / brang rdung ba dang / brang la rdeb pa dang / mgo gsig pa dang / mgo 'bar zhing skra gyen du 'greng ba dang / phan tshun shugs phyung ste rgyug cing wa'i mig lta bus
byang chub sems dpa' la 'jigs par byed do/ /bud med rgan mo dag kyang ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te/ 'di skad du kyi hud bu/ kyi hud nga'i bu/ longs shig /longs la myur du bros shig
ces 'dzer to/ /srin mo'i gzugs dang / sha za mo'i gzugs dang / yi dgas long ba/ theng po/ rke ba/ bkres pas rid pa/ lag pa bsgreng ba/ kha gcus pa dag kyang / ngu zhing 'jigs pa ston te/

sngangs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i mdun na rgyug go/ /bdud kyi dpung 'dus pa rnam pa de lta bu des dpag tshad brgyad bcu kho ra khor yug tu gang bar gyur to/ /bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi

stong chen po bye ba phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i bdud sdig can rnams kyi dpung dag gis thad ka dang / steng gang bar gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/ /srin po
yi dgas sha za'i gzugs dang bcas/ /'jig rten mi sdug drag gzugs ji snyed pa/ /thams cad sgyu yis der ni sprul pa byas/ /mgo gcig mgo gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas/ /mgo stong bar du ldan
bzhin gnod sbyin mang / /lag gcig lag gnyis lag gsum ldan pa nas/ /lag stong bar du ldan pa rab tu mang / /rkang gcig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas/ /rkang stong bar du ldan pa gzhan yang
mang / /kha bzhin sngo la lus ni ser ba dang / /kha bzhin ser la lus ni sngo ba dang / /kha bzhin dkar la lus ni gnag pa dang / /kha bzhin gnag la lus ni dkar ba dang / /kha bzhin gzhan la

lus kyang gzhan pa dang / /de 'dra'i phyag brnyan dag gi dpung rnams lhags/ /stag dang sbrul dang phag gi gdong can dang / /glang po rta dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong / /spre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang / /de 'dra'i
kha gdong ldan pa'i dpung rnams lhags/ /ral pa brdzes la 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mang / /lug mgo rus pa 'bar 'bur lba ba can/ /lus ni mi yi khrag gis rab tu sbags/ /gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag

der yang lhags/ /rkang pa dag ni rko ba'i rkang pa 'dra/ /mig gi 'bras bu spre'u'i mig dang mtshungs/ /mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra/ /kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags/ /lus kyi dbyibs ni

chu srin 'dra ba ste/ /mig gi 'bras bu gnyis ni rab tu 'bar/ /rna ba dag ni ra yi rna ba 'dra/ /kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags/ /kha cig dag ni lag na dbyig pa thogs/ /tho ba mdung thung rtse gsum
lag na thogs/ /kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs/ /'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can gnod sbyin lhags/ /gshol thogs 'khor lo thogs shing mig bsgyur dang / /ri rtse chen po lag na thogs pa dang / /

rlung dang rdo dang gnam lcags rab 'bebs shing / /gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung ba der yang lhags/ /rlung ni rab tu gtong zhing char yang 'bebs/ /brgya phrag stong gi glog kyang rab tu 'byin/ /'brug gi sgra yang sgrog

cing shing ljon sgyel/ /byang chub shing gi lo ma tsam mi g.yo/ /char pa rab tu 'bebs shing rlung yang gtong / /chu bo 'bebs shing chu yis sa yang gang / /de ltar 'jigs su rung ba mtshan mo byung / /de yi nub mo
sems med shing yang sgyel/ /thams cad dbyibs mi sdug cing gzugs mi sdug /'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong nas kyang / /yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa po/ /lhun po lta bur sems ni g.yo

ba med/ /sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs pa dang / /sprin dang 'dra bar chos rnams kun la rtog /de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtog pas na/ /legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas/ /gang zhig nga dang nga
yi snyam sems shing / /dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon zhen pa/ /mi mkhas 'dzin par gnas des mthong nas ni/ /'jigs par gyur cing bdag kyang rab tu myos/ /shAkya'i sras pos chos rnams brten byung

ba/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang rab tu ldan/ /dpung bcas g.yo sgyu mthong yang myos pa med/ /dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi bu stong po de dag gi nang nas

ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa de dag ni bdud kyi g.yas rol tu 'khod par gyur to/ /gang dag bdud kyi phyogs byed pa de dag ni bdud sdig can gyi g.yon rol tu 'khod par

gyur to/ /de na bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu de dag la smras pa/ yu bu cag ci 'dra ba'i dpung gis byang chub sems dpa' gdul bar bya/ de na g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas pha la tshigs su bcad de

smras pa/ klu yi dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod dang / /glang po'i dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod dang / /ri dgas rgyal po gnyid log slong 'dod pa/ /de ni mi dbang legs gnas slong bar 'dod/ /g.yon rol nas bdud kyi

bu blo gros ngan pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ /bltas pa tsam gyis snying yang rab tu 'gas 'gyur la/ /'jig rten dag na snying po ldan pa'i shing chen 'gas/ /bdag gi lta bas phog na 'gro ba mchis phog ltar/ /
'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i mthu ni de la ga la mchis/ /g.yas rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas smras pa/ bltas pa tsam gyis shing yang 'gas na mi rnams la/ /bdag bsgrim ci dgos shes smras snying

po ga la yod/ /gal te bltas pas ri bo lhun po 'jig 'gyur yang / /de yi mdun du khyod ni mig 'byed yong mi nus/ /gzhan yang mi gang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing / /de yi chu ni brngubs te

'thung bar nus 'gyur gyi/ /de yi kha bzhin dri ma med la mngon sum du/ /lta ba de ni de bas sdug bsngal che zhes smras/ /g.yon rol nas lag brgya pa zhes bya bas smras pa/ bdag gi lus 'di lag pa brgya mchis

pa/ /gcig gis kyang ni mda' brgya 'phang bgyis te/ /dge sbyong de yi lus ni dbug par bgyi/ /yab cig bder 'gyur ma shol khyod gshegs shig /g.yas rol nas blo bzang po zhes bya bas smras pa/ ba spu rnams

kyang ci phyir lag pa min/ /lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod/ /lag pa re rer de ltar mdung yod kyang / /de dag gis kyang de la ci mi nus/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa bsgoms/ /

byams ldan thub pa de yi sku la ni/ /dug dang mtshon dang me yis mi tshugs te/ /mtshon cha 'phangs pa thams cad me tog 'gyur/ /gzhan yang mkha' dang sa dang chu la stobs ldan gang / /mi 'am gnod sbyin ral gri dgra
sta thogs/ /mi dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de drung phyin/ /stobs chen stobs ldan de kun stobs chung 'gyur/ /g.yon rol nas gzi brjid drag shul can zhes bya bas smras pa/ bdag ni de yi lus bzang gi/ /

khong du zhugs te bsreg par bgyi/ /'brog gi me ltar chung ngu yis/ /rkang dang bcas pa'i shing yang bskam/ /g.yas rol nas mi bzangs kyis smras pa/ /khyod ni ri rab sa yi nang zhugs te/ /thams cad ma lus
bsreg par nus gyur kyang / /khyod dang 'dra ba gang gA'i bye snyed kyis/ /rdo rje'i thugs ldan de ni bsreg mi nus/ /gzhan yang ri bo thams cad 'gul yang srid/ /rgya mtsho chen po zad kyang srid/ /

nyi zla sa la lhung yang srid/ /sa ni zhu bar 'gyur yang srid/ /'jig rten don du rtsom mdzad pa/ /thugs dam nges par mdzad pa po/ /byang chub dam pa ma thob par/ /shing chen drung nas bzhengs mi srid/ /
g.yon rol nas lag rings kyis bsgyings te smras pa/ khyod kyi gnas 'dir mchis bzhin du/ /bdag gis sug pas nyi ma dang / /zla ba skar ma rnams kyi gnas/ /thams cad rab tu mnye bar bgyi/ /

rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po las/ /tshul du shis par chab kyang blang / /yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste/ /rgya mtsho'i pha rol dor bar bgyi/ /yab cig dpung 'di gzhag tu gsol/ /khyod ni thugs ngan che ma mdzad/ /

byang chub shing de drungs phyung ste/ /sug pas phyogs phyogs gtor bar bgyid/ /g.yas rol nas dad pa thob pas smras pa/ gal te khyod ni dregs bsgyings te/ /lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/ /sa dang ri dang
rgya mtshor bcas/ /de dag lag pas phyir klog kyang / /khyod dang 'dra ba stong phrag ni/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can/ /de yi ba spu g.yos mi nus/ /g.yon rol
nas 'jigs byed kyis smras pa/ /dpung gi nang na bzhugs bzhin du/ /yab khyod ci slad rab tu bsnyengs/ /de la dpung grogs ga la mchis/ /ci slad khyod 'dir de la bsnyengs/ /g.yas rol nas
blo gros rtse gcig gis smras pa/ 'jig rten dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis/ /'khor los bsgyur dang seng ge dpung ma mchis/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dpung ma mchis/ /'on kyang gcig pus bdud ni gzhom
par spyod/ /g.yon rol nas glags ltas smras pa/ mdung thung rtse gsum dbyug to ral gri rta/ /glang po shing rta rkang tang ma mchis pa/ /dge sbyong gcig pu mchis pa de bdag gis/ /do mod dgum
gyis cung zad ma bsnyengs yab/ /g.yas rol nas bsod nams brgyan gyis smras pa/ sred med bu ltar mi phyed mi shigs sku dang ldan/ /bzod stobs go mnabs brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gri mda'/ /
rnam par thar gsum bzhon pa shes rab gzhu lags yab/ /bsod nams stobs kyis de ni bdud kyi dpung las rgyal/ /g.yon rol nas phyir mi ldog pas smras pa/ 'brog me rtswa la tshig pa phyir mi ldog /lobs

pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir mi ldog /mkha' las rdo rje 'bab pa phyir mi ldog /shAkya'i bu las ma rgyal bdag gnas med/ /g.yas rol nas chos 'dod kyis smras pa/ gsher ba'i rtswa dang phrad na me yang

ldog /brag gi rtse mor bab na mda' yang ldog /rdo rje sar bab de nas gang du 'gro/ /zhi ba bdud rtsi ma thob de mi ldog /ci'i phyir zhe na/ yab cig bar snang la ni ri mo bri bar nus kyang gda'/ /sems can ji snyed kun

gyi sems ni gcig bsdur nus kyang gda'/ /yab cig nyi zla rlung ni zhags pas bcing du nus kyang gda'/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po las ni bskyod mi nus/ /g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa/

lta ba'i gdug pa chen pos lhun po bsreg par bgyi/ /rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang thal bar bgyi/ /bdag gis do mod de gnyis thal bar brlag par bgyis/ /yab cig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigs su
gsol/ /g.yas rol nas don grub kyis smras pa/ gal te dug gis 'di kun gang gyur la/ /stong gsum dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur kyang / /yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gzigs tsam gyis/ /dug ni dug

ma yin par rab tu 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum na gdug pa drag po ni/ /'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug ste/ /de dag de yi sku dang thugs la med/ /mkha' la rdzab dang rdul ni med pa bzhin/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs
kyang rab tu dag /sems can kun la byams pa'i thugs dang ldan/ /de la mtshon dang dug gis yong mi tshugs/ /de bas yab cig thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ /g.yon rol nas dga' ba chags pas smras pa/

bdag gis sil snyan stong dag rab bgyis te/ /lha yi bu mo brgyan pa bye stong gis/ /chags par bgyis te grong khyer mchog tu bkri/ /'dod la dga' bar khyod kyi dbang du bgyi/ /g.yas rol nas chos dgas smras pa/
de 'dir rtag tu chos la dgyes pas dgyes/ /bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud rtsi don la dgyes/ /sems can thar bar mdzad dang byams la dgyes/ /'dod chags dga' la de ni dgyes mi mdzad/ /g.yon rol nas rlung gi

shugs shes bya bas smras pa/ /bdag gi shugs kyis nyi zla mid bgyis la/ /nam mkha' las ni rlung yang rab gtang zhing / /yab cig do mod dge sbyong bzung nas ni/ /rlung gis phub ma bzhin du gtor bar bgyi/ /

g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar khyod kyi shugs mgyogs drag pa ltar/ /gal te lha dang mi rnams de 'drar gyur/ /de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas

kyang / /zla med gang zag de la gnod mi nus/ /g.yon rol nas tshangs pa'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ de 'dra ba yi drag po phal cher gyur kyang ni/ /khyod kyi nga rgyal cung zad 'jom mi nus/ /bgyi ba thams cad
mang pos 'grub lags na/ /gcig pus khyod la ci bgyi smos ci 'tshal/ /g.yas rol nas seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ /sa la seng ge khyus 'khod sngon ma byung / /lta ba'i gdug pa dag kyang khyus
mi 'khod/ /gzi ldan bden pa pha rol gnon pa po/ /skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyang khyus mi 'khod/ /g.yon rol nas thams cad du gdol pa zhes bya bas smras pa/ ji ltar khyod kyi sras po

brtson 'grus dang / /shugs dang stobs dang ldan pa sgra sgrogs pa/ /tshig 'bar de 'dra yab kyis sngon gsan tam/ /myur du dge sbyong de ni gzhom du bzhud/ /g.yas rol nas seng ge sgra sgrogs shes bya bas smras
pa/ nags tshal dag gi khrod na wa mang pos/ /seng ge med pa de na sgra yang sgrog /seng ges sgra bsgrags 'jigs pa thos pa dang / /skrag nas phyogs phyogs dag tu rab tu 'bros/ /de ltar bdud bu mi
mkhas 'di dag kyang / /mi mchog gsung ni ma thos de bar du/ /de dag spyi rtol byed cing byung rgyal smra/ /mi yi seng ges gsung bsgrags 'bros par 'gyur/ /g.yon rol nas nyes par bsam pa sems
pas smras pa/ bdag gis gang bsams myur du 'dir 'grub na/ /de ni ci slad dpung tshogs 'di mi lta/ /gang phyir langs te myur du mi 'bros pas/ /de ni glen pa cho ga ma 'tshal ba/ /g.yas rol nas

don legs par bsam pa sems pa zhes bya bas smras pa/ de ni mi glen pha rol gnon pa ste/ /khyed cag glen zhing shin tu ma bsdams pa/ /khyed kyis de yi mthu rtsal yong mi shes/ /de yi shes rab stobs kyis
thams cad pham/ /bdud kyi bu ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /khyed cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu brtsal can/ /de yi ba spu gcig kyang g.yos mi nus/ /gsad par bsams pa mi 'grub smos ci dgos/ /
khyod ni de la yid kyis gnod ma sems/ /gus dang bcas par dad pa'i sems su gyis/ /'di ni srid gsum rgyal por gyur pas na/ /'thab mo ma byed par ni slar log shig /de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar

bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa dang nag po'i phyogs pa stong du tshang ba de dag thams cad kyis so so nas bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras so/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyi sde dpon sde bzang po zhes bya ba des bdud

sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /gang dag khyod kyi rjes 'brang brgya byin dang / /skyong dang mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams dang / /lha min dbang dang mkha' lding dbang po rnams/ /thal mo sbyar te de la phyag 'tshal na/ /

khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma lags pa/ /tshangs pa 'od gsal lha yi bu rnams dang / /gnas gtsang ris kyi lha rnams de dag kun/ /de la phyag 'tshal ba ni smos ci 'tshal/ /khyod kyi sras po shes rab can/ /stobs

dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' la/ /snying dang 'thun gyur phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpag tshad brgyad bcur khyab pa yi/ /gnod sbyin la sogs bdud dpung 'di/ /phal cher rab tu dang
yid kyis/ /kun kyang nyes pa med la lta/ /'jigs su rung zhing drag bsgyur ba/ /dpung tshogs mi bzad 'di gzigs nas/ /ngo mtshar ma gyur zhum mi mnga'/ /nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur/ /gang na
dpung 'di gnas pa der/ /wa dang 'ug pa sgra 'byin la/ /bya rog bong bu sgra 'byin pas/ /myur du slar ni ldog pa'i rigs/ /byang chub snying por gzigs su gsol/ /pa ta kun ta ngang pa dang / /khu byug
rma bya mngon skor bas/ /nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur/ /gang na dpung 'di gnas pa der/ /rdul dang snag tsa'i char 'bab la/ /sa dkyil me tog char 'bab pas/ /bdag gi tshig bzhin ldog pa'i rigs/ /
gang na dpung 'di gnas pa de/ /shang shong gyur cing tsher mas gang / /sa dkyil dri med gser gyur pas/ /shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs/ /gal te mi 'dod sngar rmis pa'i/ /rmi lam de dag mngon sum
'gyur/ /drang srong rnams kyi yul brlag pa/ /de bzhin dpung 'di thal bar klog /rgyal po 'gro ba drang srong mchog /tshangs pas byin gyis khros byas pas/ /dan da ka yi nags tshal tshig /

lo mang zhig tu rtswa ma skyes/ /drang srong brtul zhugs spyod pa po/ /dka' thub ldan pa'i 'jig rten na/ /ji snyed 'khod pa kun gyi mchog /'byung po kun la mi 'tshe 'di/ /gang gi lus la mtshan rab 'bar/ /

khyim nas kyang ni byung ba der/ /nyon mongs pham byas 'tshang rgya zhes/ /khyod kyis sngon chad ma gsan nam/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don du/ /'byor pa 'di 'dra 'di dag sprul/ /de bas nges par sems
can mchog /sbyin bsreg dam pa len par 'gyur/ /'di yi mdzod spu dri med pa/ /bye ba khrag khrig zhing du mdzes/ /de yis bdag cag mog mog bgyis/ /bdud dpung nges bcom gdon mi 'tshal/ /
srid pa'i rtse gnas lha rnams kyis/ /de yi spyi gtsug bltar mi nus/ /nges par gzhan gyis ma bstan par/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar lhun po khor yug dang / /nyi zla brgya byin
tshangs pa dang / /shing ljon rnams dang ri mchog kun/ /sa dkyil phyag 'tshal bgyid las na/ /bsod nams stobs can shes rab stobs/ /ye shes stobs can bzod pa'i stobs/ /brtson 'grus stobs
dang ldan pa de/ /bdud phyogs stobs med mdzad par nges/ /glang pos so ma btang snod dang / /seng ges ji ltar wa bcom dang / /nyi mas srin bu me khyer ltar/ /bde bar gshegs pas dpung bcom 'gyur/ /

tshig de skad thos pa dang bdud kyi bu gzhan zhig shin tu khros nas mig dmar por gyur te smras pa/ khyod ni gcig pu de yi bsngags pa dag /shin tu dpag tu med par brjod byed na/ /gcig pu des ni ci zhig bya bar

nus/ /'jigs su rung ba'i dpung chen ma mthong ngam/ /de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya bas smras pa/ 'jig rten nyi zla seng ge dang / /'khor los bsgyur la grogs byed med/ /byang chub

bzhugs nas nges pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' grogs mi dgos/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bdud mthu chung bar bya ba'i phyir gang mthong bas bdag gi dpung byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i nang du zhugs so snyam du

sems shing bdud bros par gyur pa dang / bros nas kyang ci yang ma yin no snyam nas yang slar log ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phen cing / ri rab tsam gyi ri
de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phangs pa dang / me tog gi bla re dang / gzhal med khang du gyur te gnas pa dang / gang dag mig gdug pa dang / myur du gdug pa dang / dbugs gdug pa rnams

me lce gtong ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor de yang byang chub sems dpa' la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas par bya ba'i phyir pad ma 'dab ma brgya pa rgyas pa lta bu'i bzhin bskyod do/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpas

lag pa g.yas pas mgo la byugs pa dang / bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lag na ral gri thogs par mthong nas lho phyogs su bros pa dang ci yang ma yin no snyam nas yang slar log go/ /slar log nas kyang

byang chub sems dpa'i steng du mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / dgra sta dang / bong ba dang / gtun shing dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / dbyug

to dang / 'khor lo dang / tho ba dang / shing drungs phyung dang / pha bong dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyi thu lum shin tu 'jigs pa du ma 'phen te/ de dag kyang 'phangs ma thag tu me tog gi phreng ba dang / me tog
gi bla rer gyur te gnas so/ /me tog sil mar yang gyur nas sa la 'thor ba dang / phreng ba'i chun por yang 'phyang bas byang chub kyi shing brgyan par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bkod pa 'byor pa
de dag mthong nas bdud sdig can phrag dog dang ser snas sems la gnod de/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ kye rgyal bu gzhon nu bzhengs/ bzhengs/ rgyal srid la spyod cig /khyod kyi bsod nams

de tsam gyis khyod kyis thar pa ga la 'thob/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas brtan la zab cing rgya che ba dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can khyod kyis ni

gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thob tu zad do/ /ngas ni mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so/ /lag pa dang / rkang pa dang /
mig dang / mgo dag kyang bcad cing slong ba rnams la byin no/ /sems can rnams thar bar bya ba'i phyir khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mal cha dang / gos dang / 'chags dang / bskyed mos tshal

rnam pa du ma dag kyang slong ba rnams la byin no/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad de byang chub sems dpa' la slar smras pa/ sngon chad kho bos mchod sbyin kha na ma tho med/ /gtan pa med pa

byas pa khyod 'dir dpang du yod/ /khyod la 'di na dpang po gang yang yod min pas/ /smras kyang phan pa ci yod khyod ni pham par gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sdig can sa 'di ni nga'i dpang yin no/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpas bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi 'khor la byams pa dang snying rje sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas/ seng ge ltar mi 'jigs mi skrag la bag tsha ba med cing mi dman la ma zhum

pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / ma brnyogs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / spu zing zhes byed pa med par lag mthil na dung dang / rgyal mtshan dang / nya dang / bum pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / lcags kyu dang /
'khor lo'i mtshan ma yod pa/ sor mo bar dra bas 'brel ba/ sen mo shin tu mdzes shing zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pas brgyan pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen la shin tu gzhon pa/ bskal pa dpag tu med par dge

ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pas grub pa'i lag pa g.yas pas lus thams cad la byugs nas tshul du shis par sa la brdabs te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ /sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te/ /

rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms shing nye mkhon med/ /'di ni bdag gi dpang ste bdag brdzun med/ /'di la khyod ni bdag gi dpang byos shig /byang chub sems dpas sa chen po 'di la reg ma thag tu rnam pa drug tu g.yos/

rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /'di lta ste dper na/ yul ma ga d+hA'i brdab khar sgra 'byung zhing sgra rgyun ring ba de bzhin du sa chen
po 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i lag pas bsnun ma thag tu sgra byung zhing sgra rgyun ring du byung ngo // //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
bam po bcu bzhi pa/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba sa'i lha mo'i 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang ldan pa gang yin

pa des sa chen po thams cad g.yos par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu sa brtol te/ lus rgyan thams cad gyis brgyan pa phyed phyung nas byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de
logs su lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de de bzhin no/ /skyes bu chen po de de bzhin no/ /khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin te/ 'di ni

bdag la mngon sum mo/ /de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dpang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur pa dam pa lags so/ /sa'i lha mo chen mo brtan mas

de skad ces smras nas/ rnam pa du mar bdud sdig can gyi glags ni med par byas/ byang chub sems dpa' la ni bstod de/ rang gi mthu rnam pa mang po bstan nas 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /
g.yon can dpung bcas sa sgra de thos nas/ /nags su seng ges sgra bsgrags was thos dang / /bya rog rdo 'phangs mod la 'byer ba bzhin/ /sngangs skrag snying gas thams cad rab tu byer/ /de nas bdud sdig

can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yi ma rangs la skyengs bzhin du nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas ma song la phyir yang ma log cing bros kyang ma bros te phyir bltas nas yang dpung rnams la smras pa/ khyed lhan cig

'dus te cung zad cig sdod cig /rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems can rin po che glo bur du chud mi gzan par kho bos rjes su 'chags pas 'di bslang bar nus sam mi nus sad par bya'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang
gi bu mo rnams la smras pa/ bu mo khyed deng ste byang chub kyi snying por song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags dang bcas pa 'am/ 'on te 'dod chags med/ ci gti mug can nam/ 'on te shes rab can/
ci ldongs pa zhig gam/ 'on te phyogs shes pa zhig gam/ 'on te dpung gnyen med pa zhig gam/ dman pa zhig gam brtan pa zhig yin pa bgoms shig /tshig de thos nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag byang chub kyi

snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'khod de/ bud med kyi sgyu rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis nye bar bstan to/ /rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis

gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i nang nas kha cig ni bzhin phyed 'gebs pa dang / kha cig ni nu ma mkhrang zhing 'bur ba ston pa dang / kha cig ni cung zad 'dzum pas so'i phreng ba ston pa dang / kha cig ni lag pa

brkyang ste bya rmyangs byed cing mchan khung ston pa dang / kha cig ni bim pa ltar dmar ba'i mchu ston pa dang / kha cig ni mig phyed btsums te byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing / bltas nas myur ba myur bar

'dzums pa dang / kha cig ni nu ma phyed g.yogs te ston pa dang / kha cig ni gos snyil bar byas te/ gser gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i rked pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni gos du ku la srab mo gyon te/ gser

gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i rked pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni rkang gdub sgra sil sil 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni nu ma'i bar nas phreng ba gcig nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni brla phyed tsam brdzes pa nye bar ston pa dang /

kha cig ni mgo dang phrag pa dag la bya 'dab sbed dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs 'dug par nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la mig zur gyis lta ba dang / kha cig ni gos legs par bgos kyang

bgo ma legs pa lta bur bcos pa dang / kha cig ni rked pa dang / gser gyi phag ska skyod pa dang / kha cig ni 'khrul ba ltar 'chos shing sgeg ste phan tshun 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gar byed pa dang / kha cig ni

glu len pa dang / kha cig ni bsgegs shing ngo tsha ba ltar yang 'chos pa dang / kha cig ni chu shing rlung gis bskyod pa ltar brla sgul ba dang / kha cig ni brjid pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni seng ras bgos te gser

gyi phag ska dril bu can bcings nas dgod cing 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gos dang rgyan rnams sa la 'dor zhing ngo tsha ba ltar slar yang len pa dang / kha cig ni gsang ba dang / gsal ba'i rgyan thams cad

nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni lag pa spos kyis bskus par ston pa dang / kha cig ni mkhur ba bskus shing rna cha yang ston pa dang / kha cig ni mgo yang g.yogs shing bzhin yang g.yogs la skad cig tsam gyis

ston pa dang / kha cig ni sngon rgod rgod pa dang / dga' dga' ba dang / rtse rtse ba phan tshun dran par byed cing yang ngo tsha ba ltar 'dug pa dang / kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs dang / bu ma btsas pa'i gzugs dang / na chung
tshad la bab pa'i gzugs ston pa dang / kha cig ni 'dod pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' la sgugs pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la me tog sil mas 'thor ba dag ste/ byang chub sems

dpa'i mdun du 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa la rtog cing gdong du yang lta ste/ 'di ci chags pa'i dbang pos lta 'am 'on te mig rgyang ring du lta 'am/ g.yo 'am mi g.yo zhes bltas na/ byang chub sems

dpa'i bzhin dag cing dri ma med la sgra gcan las thar ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'dug pa dang / nyi ma thog ma shar ba lta bu dang / gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang / pad ma 'dab ma stong pa rgyas pa lta bu dang / gtor

bar bya ba gtor ba'i me lta bu dang / lhun po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / khor yug ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang / dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang / glang po ltar sems shin tu dul bar mthong ngo / /de nas bdud kyi bu mo

de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu chags par bya ba'i phyir glu dang gar du sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dus kyi dam pa sos ka bzang la bab/ /zhugs shing me tog rgyas kyis dgyes par rol/ /khyod kyi

gzugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste/ /mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdag cag 'gyur/ /bdag cag skyes pa legs skyes dbyibs legs te/ /lha mi bde ba'i rkyen du bdag cag byung / /byang chub rnyed dkas thugs

ni slar sgyur la/ /myur du bzhengs te dar la bab pa spyod/ /khyod kyi ched du chas nas rab tu brgyan te lhags gyur pa/ /lha yi bu mo legs par brgyan pa 'di dag rnams la gzigs/ /gzugs 'di bltas nas shing rul lta bur
srog tsam lus pa yang / /chags par 'gyur na chags pas dga' ba su zhig chags mi 'gyur/ /skra 'jam shin tu dri zhim dri dang ldan/ /cod pan rna cha 'dab ris bzhin rgyas la/ /dpral ba legs shing legs

byugs bzhin dang ldan/ /pad ma rgyas pa lta bur mig yangs legs/ /kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste/ /shing tog bim pa smin 'dra'i mchu dang ldan/ /dung dang kun da kha ba dkar so ldan/ /sdug pa dga' la chags

pa rnams la gzigs/ /nu ma shin tu mkhrang zhing rgyas la 'bur/ /lto ba'i rked na gnyer gsum shin tu mdzes/ /rked pa 'khor sa lta bur yangs shing mdzes/ /na chung shin tu mdzes la mgon po gzigs/ /glang po'i

sna 'dra ba yi brla ldan zhing / /lag pa gdu bus chal par gang ba can/ /rked pa gser gyi phag ska rab mdzes brgyan/ /khyod kyi bran mo 'di la mgon po gzigs/ /ngang pa'i stabs ldan dal gyis mchi bgyid pa/ /'jam

zhing yid 'ong 'dod ldan mdzes smra ba/ /rnam pa 'di ltar shin tu legs brgyan la/ /lha yi dga' ba rnams la shin tu mkhas/ /glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gar rab bslabs/ /dga' ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs

can skyes/ /'dod la rab dga' gal te mi bzhed na/ /'jig rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bslus/ /mi glen nor gyi bde ba mi shes 'ga'/ /gter mthong nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar/ /khyod kyang 'dod chags mi mkhyen
rang lhags pa/ /na chung rnams la mi spyod de dang 'dra/ /dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums par 'dzum dmul te/ bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung zhing / dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs

pa dang / lus ma bcos pa dang / brjid pa dang / ma chags pa dang / mi sdang ba dang / ma rmongs pa dang / ri'i dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / ma zhum pa dang / ma gyur pa dang / 'dzem pa med pa/ blo shin tu legs

par gnas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu spangs pa'i phyir rang gi kha na las pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang / tshangs pa las lhag pa'i nga ro dang / bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs
dang / snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong bas bdud kyi bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ 'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po stsogs shing sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste/ /mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu
'phrul dka' thub nyams par byed/ /bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med ces mkhas pas smras/ /nga ni mi mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur/ /'dod pa bsten na srid pa phyir zhing rnam par

'phel 'gyur te/ /dper na mi 'ga' la la tshwa chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin/ /de la zhugs pa bdag gi don min gzhan gyi don kyang min/ /nga ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la spro ba yin/ /khyod kyi gzugs ni

chu bur dag dang dbu ba mtshungs shing 'dra/ /sgyu ma'i tshon ltar rang gi blo yis rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ /rmi lam dag na rtse ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang / /byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems ni rtag tu rmongs par byed/ /

mig ni chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra ste lpags pas g.yogs/ /khrag rlang mkhrang zhing 'bur ba dper na nad kyi 'bras dang mtshungs/ /lto ni gcin dang phyi sa sogs te shin tu mi gtsang ba/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor las dang

nyon mongs pa las yang dag byung / /byis pa'i blo can dag ni rmongs gyur phyin ci log pa yis/ /lus gang la ni sdug par rtog pa mkhas pa de lta min/ /sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar yun ring 'khor byed na/ /

sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal mi bzad mang po myong / /rked pa nas ni rab tu yid mi 'ong ba'i dri can 'dzag /brla dang byin pa rkang pa dag ni 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas/ /nga yis khyed la yang dag brtags na sgyu ma ji bzhin te/ /

phyin ci log gi rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa yin/ /'phags pa'i ye shes lam las gol ba phyin gyur pa/ /me dang dug gi lo ma 'dra zhing sbrul chen khros 'dra ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan yon tan min zhing yon tan nyams mthong na/ /

de la byis pa bde ba'i 'du shes skyed cing brgyal bar gyur/ /mi gang 'dod pas bud med rnams kyi khol por gyur pa dang / /gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing / /dga' la brkam pa de ni tshul khrims lam las gol gyur

cing / /bsam gtan lam gol blo nyams ye shes las ni rab ring gnas/ /nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te/ /rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas par byed ma yin/ /mi dga' ba dang dga' dang lhan cig

gnas pa ma yin la/ /nga yi sems ni rab tu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 'dra/ /gal te khyed 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'dir ni gang gyur la/ /bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni/ /nga la tha ba med cing chags med

gti mug mi 'gyur te/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra phyir ro/ /lha dang lha mo shin tu dri med la/ /khrag dang rus pa med cing rab bzang ba/ /de dag kun kyang 'jigs pa cher gnas te/ /rtag dngos bral zhing

ther zug med phyir ro/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo bud med kyi sgyu rnams shin tu bslabs pa de dag de bas kyang cher 'dod chags dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa bskyed de/ steg pa bstan nas lus rnams brgyan te/ bud med kyi g.yo

nye bar bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' la rngod do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bu mo'i nang na gces mchog sred dang dga' dang dga' can lhan cig tu/ /bdud kyis btang ba shin tu tshul du shis par rings par lhags gyur te/ /

shing gi lcug ma gzhon nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shing drung 'dug la rngod par byed/ /dus kyi nang na dam pa mchog tu bgyi ba sos ka'i dus 'di ste/ /skyes pa dag dang bud

med dga' bar bgyid cing mun pa rdul yang bcom/ /khu byug dang ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byin bya tshogs rnams kyis gang / /'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la da bab po/ /bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul

zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa/ /ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo nyi ma shar ma thag pa'i gzugs/ /'brug bsgrags lta bur sgra snyan ri dgas dbang po sgra bsgrags 'dra ba po/ /'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras

pa/ /'dod pa rtsod dang dgra dang 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa/ /byis pa'i skye bos nye bar bsten gyi mkhas pa'i skye bos rtag spangs pa/ /gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i dus la bab gyur gyis/ /do mod bdud

las rgyal te stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur/ /sgyu rnams bsten nas smras pa zhal ras pad ma 'dra ba gsan du gsol/ /khyod ni rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa sa bdag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bud med dam pa'i

tshogs kyis sil snyan stong dag rab tu bgyid 'gyur na/ /thub pa'i cha byad kyis ni ci bgyis spongs la dga' ba bsten du gsol/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nga ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod la/ /

chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /slob dang mi slob bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed/ /chos kyi dga' bas dga' yi yul la nga yi yid ni dga' ma yin/ /de dag gis smras

pa/ /re shig dar la bab pa ma yol dang po thor bur gyur pa dang / /khyod ni re shig snyun gyis ma btab mi shis bgres par ma gyur dang / /ji srid dar la bab cing bdag cag grogs kyang dar la bab gyur pa/ /de srid bar du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod

pa'i dga' ba spyad du gsol/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ji srid do mod dal ba dam pa 'chi med dkon pa rnyed pa dang / /ji srid lha dang lha min grong khyer mi khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang / /ji srid rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i dgra yis

dkrugs par ma gyur pa/ /de srid nga ni 'jigs med grong khyer 'gro ba'i lam mchog bsgom par bya/ /de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i gnas na sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mos bskor ba dang / /'thab bral 'thab bral rab dang dga' ldan rab

dang bdud kyi grong khyer na/ /lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas 'dod dga' la/ /rol cing spyod la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig dgyes pa rgya chen mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dod pa rtswa rtse'i zil

thigs bzhin du myur la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs/ /klu yi bu mo khro ba lta bur shin tu 'jigs par byed pa yin/ /brgya byin 'thab bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag bdud kyi dbang du song / /'phags min rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal

ldan pa 'di la su zhig dga'/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shing mchog 'di dag lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur la/ /shang shang te'u dang khu byug sgra 'byin bung ba sgra 'byin ldan pa gzigs/ /sa las rtswa 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing

snum la lcang lo can mchis pa/ /nags mchog mi ci tshogs kyis bsten par na chung rnams dang dgyes par mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lo mar bcas pa'i shing rnams 'di dag dus kyi dbang gis me tog rgyas/ /

bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyen nas me tog rnams su lhags/ /gang zhig dus na sa las skyes pa rnams kyang nyi mas skams par 'gyur/ /nga 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par spyad/ /bdud kyi bu mo

rnams kyis smras pa/ /zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs shig pad ma sar pa 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can/ /snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig ldan so ni dngul dang kha ba 'dra/ /'di 'dra lha yi gnas na dkon na mi yi gnas na ga la mchis/ /

gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rtag tu 'dod par bgyi ba khyod kyis brnyes/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lus ni ngan skyugs mi gtsang srin bu'i rigs kyis gang ba shig shig po/ /myur du 'gyes shing 'jig pa bde ba ma yin rnams dang

ldan par mthong / /rgyu bar bcas dang mi rgyu ba yi 'gro la bde ba mchog byed pa/ /go 'phang 'chi 'pho med pa skye bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya/ /de dag 'dod pa'i sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi myong bar gyur pa ste/ /rkang gdub gser gyi phag

ska 'khrol zhing gos kyang shig shig byas nas ni/ /'dod pa'i mda' yis phog pa rgyags pa 'dzum zhing 'di skad smras/ /jo jo khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bsten mi bgyi/ /srid pa kun gyis nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas

'di skad smras/ /'dod pa ral gri mdung thung rtse gsum sbrang rtsi can gyi spu gri 'dra/ /sbrul gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu rig pas na/ /bud med yon tan 'phrog pas de phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnams spangs/ /bud med

yon tan rnam pa mang po khrag khrig bye ba de dag gis/ /gang gis tshe na glang po'i phru gu'i stabs can de brngod ma nus tshe/ /ngo tsha skyengs nas thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ /dga' zhing mgu ba bskyed nas phan pa byed pa

de la bstod pa byas/ /pad ma dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'i zhal/ /mar gyis sbyin bsreg bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba/ /srid pa brgya nas spyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig /bdag

nyid rgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du gsol/ /de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shing dang tsam pa ka 'dra rnam mang bstod/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni/ /song ste pha yi rkang la mgo

bos phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras/ /yab cig lha dang mi yi bla ma de la khong khro spangs na legs/ /bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig gis lta/ /de ni chags pas skye bo mi lta de la khro gnyer mchis ma

lags/ /lhun po g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gda'/ /srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi dbang mi 'gyur/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas de bas kyang cher sdug bsngal zhing yid

mi bde la/ yid ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la smras pa/ kye mi shes shing glen te/ khyed kyi gzugs dang da rod ma mthong ngam/ ji ltar gyur na de byang chub kyi snying po las bslang bar ma nus/ de nas bdud

kyi bu mo de dag gis rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma mchis te/ /gsang ba chen po lta yang sdang ba mchis ma lags/ /spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma mchis/ /

lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin tu zab/ /bud med nongs pa rgya chen the tshom ma mchis rtogs/ /'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags chags ma mchis/ /gang zhig de yi sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba/ /lha yul

mi yul 'di na lha mi de ma mchis/ /de la bud med sgyu rnams gang lags bstan na yab/ /chags bcas gang lags de yi snying zhu 'gyur rigs na/ /de dag mthong yang de yi sems ni gcig ma g.yos/ /ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni mi g.yo

g.yo ma mchis/ /bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas bltam yon tan gzi brjid rdzogs/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul zhugs spyad/ /lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid rnam dag dge/ /de dag de yi rkang par mgos gtugs

phyag kyang 'tshal/ /sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi/ /rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur nges/ /yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor 'thab pa mi 'tshal te/ /stobs ldan dag dang 'thab par sbyor 'di

tshegs rab che/ /yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen gtsug phud can/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gus par gnas/ /rin chen 'byung gnas yan lag me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /stobs bcu mnga' bas

mchod phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs/ /gang dag sems pa ma mchis gang dag sems ma mchis/ /shing ri lha dbang gnod sbyin mkha' lding dbang po dag /yon tan ri bor mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las/ /yab cig

do mod slar log na ni legs pa 'dra/ /gzhan yang gang gi pha mthar mi phyin der ni rkyal mi bgyi/ /gang zhig rtsa nas mi phyin de ni brko m-i bgyi/ /gang la bzod pa yang gsol de ni dkrug mi bgyi/ /gang gis yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba de mi

bgyi/ /dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan dang / 'phel mo dang / dka' thub dang / dge ma dang / mkhas ma dang / mdangs stobs dang / bden smra dang / ldan ma ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems

dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed/ mngon du bstod par byed de/ sems can dam pa khyod ni dgung zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o/ /blo rnam par dam pa khyod ni

gdugs dang po shar ba ltar lhang nge ba'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni chab kyi nang na pad ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni

rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni khor yug gi ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar rin po ches bltam zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /'jig rten

gyi mgon po khyod ni nam mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o/ /sems can rnam par dag pa khyod ni dog sa ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cing thugs shin tu brtan pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni mtsho

ma dros pa ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa mi mnga' ba'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni rlung mar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rtag tu mi chags shing thugs gnas ma mchis pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi

rgyal po ltar rlom sems can thams cad spangs shing bsnyen par dka' ba'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu ltar thul bar dka' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pas

dam bcas pa brtan pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar mi ldog pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni ring por mi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pas brnyes pa legs par

brnyes pa'o/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo rnams kyis dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed do/ /dge slong dag de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug

gis bdud nyams dmas par byed de/ rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po ltar sems khongs su chud cing dmas pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni glang po rgan po 'dam du bying ba ltar nyam chung ba'o/ /

sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor khas 'chas pa pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'brog tu bor ba ltar gnyis su med pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni glang bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o/ /

sdig can khyod ni shing rlung gis btab pa ltar sgyel ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni 'dron pa lam stor ba ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni mi dbul po bu lon can ltar dman pa bas kyang dman pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni

bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor smra ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa mi gzo ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni seng ge'i sgras wa 'bros pa ltar deng 'bros par 'gyur ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni rnam

par 'thor rlung gis gtor ba'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar dus mi shes pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni snod chag pa rdul gyis gang ba ltar deng rnam par spang bar 'gyur

ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sbrul la bab pa ltar deng tshar chod par 'gyur ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni mi rkang lag bcad pa ltar stobs thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o/ /dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i

ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can nyam smad pa byas so/ /dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed de/ bcu drug gang zhe na/

'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni dpa' bos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar byang chub sems dpas do mod pham par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni gyad stobs chung ngu la gyad stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems

dpas tshar bcad par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni phub ma spar ba gang la rlung mar btab pa ltar

do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni wa la seng ge bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sngangs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni shing sA la chen po rtsa ba nas bcad pa ltar do mod

byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni ba rjes kyi chu la nyi tshan chen
po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can gsad par bya ba shor ba ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro/ /

sdig can khyod ni me'i tsha bas bung ba'i khyu ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par

'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sems khongs su bcug par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni 'brog dgon par lam rgyags chad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas

phongs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltar

do mod byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brnyil bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen

bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang bdud sdig can phyir ma log go/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bskul ba thos kyang bdud ni phyir

log ma gyur te/ /slongs shig rgyob shig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig /'di ni rang nyid rgyal nas nga yi yul nas gzhan yang sgrol bar byed par 'gyur/ /langs te bros pa ma
gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan cung zad med ces smras/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ri yi rgyal po lhun po gnas nas g.yo srid 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid/ /skar ma'i tshogs rnams

thams cad zla ba bcas par mkha' las sa la ltung yang srid/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skam srid kyi/ /nga 'dra shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yong

mi srid/ bdud kyis smras pa/ kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang / /lha dang lha min tshogs bcas mi dang dud 'gro rnams/ /kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du 'gyur/ /kho bo'i yul na

'dug pa longs la tshig bzhin gyis/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang min/ /yang dag nga ltos nga yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin/ /gal te ngan 'gror mi 'gro khyod ni 'dod

dbang phyug /dbang med khyod ni lta bzhin byang chub ngas thob 'gyur/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig pu dgon par ci zhig byed/ /khyod kyis gang btsal de dang phrad par sla ma yin/ /rab 'gro shes

ldan la sogs dka' thub rab bsgrims kyang / /go 'phang mchog de ma thob mir gyur khyod ci smos/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khro ba'i zil non blo dang lha yul 'dod pa dang / /bdag la rtag dang mi rtag

snyam du gnas pa dang / /yul du 'gro bas gnas pa thar snyam gnas pa yi/ /drang srong mi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' thub spyad/ /de dag yang dag don dang bral zhing skyes bu smra/ /khyab dang phyogs gcig ches

dang kha cig rtag ces smra/ /lus can lus min yon tan min dang yon tan can/ /byed pa po dang byed po min zhes gzhan dag 'dzer/ /stan 'dir 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pas sde dpung bcas/ /khyod pham byas te

byang chub rdul med deng thob nas/ /'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan 'das/ /sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po bstan par bya/ /bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du rtsub pa'i tshig

tu smras pa dge sbyong 'di zung shig /gcig pu dgon par bor bar gyur pa 'di ni nga yi mdun nas zung la song ste myur du dbang du gyis/ /nga yi khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste sgo ba byed

du chug /sdug bsngal nyen nas ku co rnam pa mang po 'don cing lha yi khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byos/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nam mkha' la ni ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs cha cha ris ris phye ste so sor

bri bar nus kyang srid/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung ni mi yis rab tu bsgrims te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid/ /nyi ma zla ba mun pa rab rib med byed mkha' las sa la ltung bar byed pa nus srid

kyi/ /khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni nga bskyod nus mi 'gyur/ /bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs te ha zhes zer/ /dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga mchog gi sgra 'byin langs/ /bdud

dpung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas ni/ /kyi hud bu sdug khyod cis ma rung gyur ces zer/ /'dzam klung gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra bar ser/ /shin tu gzhon nu lha mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os/ /

khyod deng g.yul ngo chen por rab tu brlag 'gyur te/ /dbang pos lha min lta bur bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping ka'i sgra skad kyis/ /bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la

smras/ /mi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa/ /de ni shing mchog drung nas nga 'dra slong bar 'dod/ /gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grang dang / /gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin

dang / /skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor ba/ /des kyang shing drung 'dug pa nga la 'tshe mi nus/ /bdud khros sems kyis gnya shing gang gis bar tsam 'dug /shubs nas phyung ba'i ral gri non po lag na thogs/ /

dge sbyong myur longs nga yis bsam pa bzhin du song / /'od ma'i myu gu sngo ltar do mod bcad da re/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te stong gsum sa rnams 'di dag thams cad bdud kyis rab tu gang gyur la/ /kun

gyi lag na ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba yi ral gri thogs gyur kyang / /de dag nga yi ba spu bskyod par mi nus nga la gnod byed smos ci dgos/ /sun 'byin ma rings shig dang de'u re btags te nga yis brtan por dran par bya/ /

rnga mo ba lang glang chen mgo dang 'jigs mig dang / /myur gdug sbrul dang mig gdug mi bzad 'dra ba dag /me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing / /rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen/ /sprin ltar

langs te phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrog cing / /rdo rje'i lce dang lcags kyi thu lum char pa 'bebs/ /ral gri mdung thung rno dang dgra sta dug can 'bebs/ /sa ni brtol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms/ /kha cig lag pa brgya dag

gis ni mda' brgya 'phen/ /kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang me yang 'thor/ /chu skyes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtsho nas len/ /kha cig nam mkha' lding du bsgyur nas klu yang 'phen/ /kha cig khros nas lcags kyi thu lum

ri rab tsam/ /me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'phen/ /sa la lhags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed/ /'og gi chu yi phung po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug /kha cig de yi mdun dang de bzhin rgyab tu mchong / /kye ma bu zhes

g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchong / /rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la/ /glog ltar rab tu 'bar bar mig nas mngon du 'byin/ /bdud kyi dpung ni bsgyur ba mi sdug byas mthong nas/ /sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa

ji bzhin rtog /'di la bdud med stobs med 'gro med bdag kyang med/ /chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba yi 'jig rten gsum po 'khor/ /mig dang skyes pa bud med med cing bdag gi med/ /rna ba sna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus/ /chos 'di

byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang bral/ /brten nas skyes te nang yang stong zhing phyi yang stong / /bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin tu stong zhe na/ /'dul 'thun gnod sbyin des pa gang yin de dag gis/ /lag pa'i mtshon cha me tog phreng bar
mthong gyur ces/ /rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te/ /de yis lag mthil g.yon pa dra ba mchog spras pa/ /sen mo zangs mdog rab mdzes rtsibs stong 'khor lo can/ /'dzam klung gser 'bar
dang 'dra bsod nams dges bsten pas/ /tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs/ /mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas nas/ /tshig tu smras pa sa 'di nga'i dbang yin te/ /ngas ni

sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag khrig sna tshogs byas/ /slong la mi sbyin snyam ste don med gzhar ma byin/ /chu dang me dang rlung ni nga yi dbang yin te/ /tshangs pa skye dgu bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang / /gang dag phyogs

bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /bdag khrims brtul zhugs byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dpang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga yi dpang / /brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de ltar

shes rab dang / /tshad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes nga yi dpang / /rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad nga yi dpang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims

ye shes dang / /gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bsdoms kyang ni/ /de dag nga yi ba spu brgya yi char mi phod/ /de yis tshul du shis par lag pa sa la brdabs/ /khar ba'i snod ltar sa 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur/ /bdud kyi sgra thos

nas ni sa la sgyel gyur te/ /nag po'i rtsa lag rgyob shig zung shig sgra yang thos/ /lus las rngul byung gzi brjid nyams shing bzhin mdog gyur/ /rga bas bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur/ /brang rdung cho nge 'don

cing 'jigs nyen mgon yang med/ /bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur cing sems ni myos par gyur/ /glang po rta dang bzhon pa shing rta sa la lhung / /srin po grul bum dag dang sha za sngangs shing rgyug /mgo rmongs lam mi rnyed cing gnas

med skyabs kyang med/ /rlung btab nags mes byas ltar bltas nas song bar gyur/ /pha ma bu dang sring mo de bzhin phu nu dag /gang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes 'dri bar byed/ /de yi rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod/ /

bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te 'tsho ba'i skabs kyang med/ /bdud dpung rgya che mang ba mi 'khrugs snyed po de/ /thams cad rnam par 'thor cing tha dgur gyes gyur te/ /zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur/ /mthong nas

smras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes 'dzer/ /shing gi lha mos de tshe de la snying rje byas/ /chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtsa lag gtor/ /myur du longs la phyi shol ma byed skyen du song / /bla ma'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa

yin/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag gi bu yi snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te/ /sems can shin tu dag la nyes pa byas pas na/ /sdug bsngal 'jigs phongs mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang / /cir mi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid

bdag gis thob/ /lha mos smras pa/ mi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa med la nyes byed pa/ /de ni nyes dang sdug bsngal ba dang phongs pa dang / /cir mi rung zhes bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang / /gsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma

rnyed par 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min mkha' lding mi ci srin po'i dbang / /tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul 'og min bcas pa dag /'di ltar khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi dpung bcom pas/ /'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal zhes de yis

rgyal ba brjod/ /rgyan phreng chun po zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul/ /me tog a ga ru dang rgya spos tsan dan phye char 'bebs/ /sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing tshig brjod pa/ /dpa' bo dgra tshogs rgyal

rnams khyod la dgab pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /stan mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs/ /rgya chen pham mdzad dpa' bo do mod byang chub brnyes/ /stobs bcu ma 'dres so so yang dag rig pa dang / /sangs rgyas

yul rnams thams cad do mod brnyes par 'gyur/ /bdud gdul ched du 'dir ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rtsal sus mthong ba/ /bye ba sum bcu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shu bzhi/ /de dag sangs
rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon/ /bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ dgra btul ba/ g.yul

ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/

dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa

med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin
te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /

de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi

pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/

mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha stod la lha'i mig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' lha'i mig yongs su dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa rnams mthong ngo / /las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i

sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/

de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs

par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus

zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang

po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gror song ba dang / ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dag dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo / /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la
rig pa mngon sum du byed do/ /mun pa sel to/ /snang ba bskyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa

med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon

par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do/ /de bdag dang sems can gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu

dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / skye ba lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang / skye ba stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba dang / skye ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / skye ba bye ba phrag stong dang /

skye ba bye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma

nas/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no/ /bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu

gyur te/ ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rus ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o/ /kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za'o/ /tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo/ /yun ni 'di srid gcig

gnas gnas so/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo / /bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so/ /de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so/ /de nas shi 'phos

nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs
pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi

cha smad skya reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i nam tshod tsam na sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba nub par bya ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par

gtod de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yin na/ 'on kyang rga ba dang / na ba dang /

'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba mi shes te/ e ma'o rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di thams

cad zad par bya bar shes na ci ma rung snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rga ba dang 'chi ba byung / rga ba dang 'chi ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du

bsams te/ skye ba yod pas rga shi byung ste/ rga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye ba byung / skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/

des 'di snyam du bsams te/ srid pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas srid pa byung / srid pa'i
rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ len pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rkyen ni len pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod

pas len pa byung / len pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ sred pa yod pas len pa byung ste/ len pa'i rkyen ni sred pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
